The main methods include AHP, ANP, TOPSIS, VIKOR, DEMATEL, Gray Relation Methods, Fuzzy Set Theory, Rough Set Theory, and some basic multivariate

notes: B-1 班 碩一必修 (個案寫作或論文寫作 2 選 1)，集中上課

description.zh: 本課程將結合台北四班 (經管、工管、資財、資財 (北科附工校區)) 與境外三班 (泰國、大上海、華南) 進行混合班組，以團隊合作模式進行三項活動競賽 (寰騰動、寰騰撼、寰騰賽)。課程設計為兩天的內容：包括 1. 隊呼競賽 2. 闖關活動 3. 哈佛個案競賽以呼應 EMBA 應具備的四到 (學到、交到、做到、玩到)。
description.en: This course is to develop the ability to lead business transformation and team building in the dynamic economic environment. There are three parts to this course: 1. Cheerleading contest 2. Team building activities 3. Harvard Business School case contest. The goals of this course are four must-do in EMBA( to Learn, Make friends, play, and make it)

notes: 碩一必修 114/04/12-13 (在台上課) 實體與遠距教學

description.zh: 本課程主要目的是了解企業與顧客之關係，促使顧客滿意及忠誠回應而產生終身價值，進而提昇企業獲利。課程內容包括顧客關係管理的概念與本質、顧客行為、顧客資料探勘、顧客關係管理系統、顧客關係管理專案之規劃與管理、顧客關係管理的績效衡量、顧客關係管理實務研討。
description.en: The objectives of this course are to learn the relationship between corporation and customer, to increase the profit by customer lifetime value through customer satisfaction and royalty. The topics of this course includes Concepts and Context of CRM, Consumer Behavior, Customer data mining, CRM system, Planning and management of CRM projects, Performance Measurement of CRM, Customer Relationship Management :Practices.

description.zh: 本行為經濟專題課程: 1.	介紹全球總體經濟以及政經情勢探討：從消費、投資、政府支出、進口、出口、外匯、利率、失業率、政府政策、地理位置等方面來分析經濟行為以及決策行為。2.	介紹管理者或一般大眾在作決策時，會產生的心理偏誤。另外，也提供管理者或一般大眾如何避心理偏誤，並改善其決策程序，以心理學的角度來探討。3.	從總體經濟數據中，找出可行投資方向。4.	運用幾位諾貝爾經濟學獎得主之文章，來介紹公司 (個人) 行為決策 5.	公司或個人如何利用期貨選擇權來進行公司 (個人) 理財投資行為之介紹
description.en: The empirical and theoretical evidence for the efficient market hypothesis (EMH) has been challenged over the past two decades. Behavioural Economics starts from the premise that, in the real world, investors do not follow the rational assumptions which underlie the EMH. Behavioural Economics has developed to try to explain financial market anomalies which could effect the functioning of these markets.

notes: (群組 2) 組織領導與人力資源管理

description.zh: 資訊安全以全面觀點說明執行完整的資訊與通訊安全管理所需考量的各個層面，課程包括：資訊安全管理國際標準、資訊安全政策與組織、人力資源安全、資產管理、存取控制、密碼學與金鑰管理、實體與環境安全、作業與通訊管理 系統獲取、開發及維護、供應商管理、資訊安全事故管理、營運持續管理之資訊安全層面、制度及法規的遵循
description.en: Information Security provides a comprehensive view of information and communication security. This course content includes as follows: information security management international standards, information security policy and organization, human resource security, asset management, access control, cryptography and key management, physical and environmental security, operations and communication management system acquisition, development and maintenance, supplier management, information security incident management, operational sustainability management, information security aspects, systems and regulatory compliance.

description.zh: 1. 建立企業經營策略的基本認知 2. 學習企業經營轉型與創新策略 3. 分享企業經營策略案例 4. 提升學生經營管理能力
description.en: 1. Establish basic understanding of business management2. Learn business transformation and innovative strategies3. Share cases of enterprise management strategies4. Promote student’s management ability

notes: (群組 1) 經營與策略管理 (聯輔會) 台北上課 (關聯群 4)

description.zh: 本課程從品牌在公司經營中所應扮演的策略性角色，課程中以品牌理論來探討品牌行銷策略的重要關鍵議題。課程內容包含品牌特性、品牌權益、品牌行銷、品牌競爭、品牌策略。身為公司品牌經營者，面對國際化與多變化的行銷環境中，能做出最佳的品牌行銷決策。
description.en: This program is designed to help students learn about and apply the concepts and practices of branding as they are used in a wide variety of settings in product and service firms, consumer and business markets, organizations, business. The topics covered in this class include: The nature of brand, brand marketing, brand competition, brand strategy. After taking the course, the students should be able to make the best brand decisions under the internationalized and changeable marketing environment.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹高階主管的領導理論與實務。課程目的有三個：(1) 了解高階主管的領導與管理；(2) 討論領導與組織管理的理論與實證發現之間的差異；(3) 對實務界高階主管提供具體建議。
description.en: This course focuses on the theory and practice of senior manager’s leadership and management in organization. Its purpose is threefold: (1) To gain an understanding of what the content of organizational leadership and management is (especially for the senior managers); (2) to effectively combine the basic concepts of leadership and organization management and empirical findings and discuss the discrepancies and implications; (3) to discuss practical implications for senior managers’ leadership.

name.en: The Leadership Philosophy of Senior Manager

notes: (群組 2) 組織領導與人力資源管理

description.zh: 本課程可使學生瞭解：貨幣與資金市場、投資問題、如何取得資金與運用資金、使公司價值最大、使股東權益最大化、瞭解代理制度、瞭解公司股票、債務之利用，股利政策等事項・
description.en: This course has provided: money and capital market, Investments, How to obtaining and using funds, Maximize the value o their firms, How to maximize stockholders' stock, To know agency problem, To know the price of the firm's stock, use of debt and dividend policy.

description.zh: 課程重點：(1) 藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2) 使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3) 熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4) 透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through reading materials appropriate to their levels; (2) to develop reading skill by giving explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as analysis of basic writing skill; (3)to  familiarize students with useful expressions in conversation and build up their confidence in cross-cultural communication; (4)to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

description.zh: 本課程「國語文實務應用」，專為本校科技大學的同學而設計，以未來於職場（生存）與人生（生活、生命）之實務應用為教學標的。     奠基於大學之前 12 年的國語文能力上，課程設計朝向多元實務應用的方向，以建構學生多元溝通表達之職場需求力為要，包括資訊蒐集力、資訊應用力、簡報製作力、文案企劃力、自我宣傳力、口語溝通力、採訪寫作力、理念論述力、創新思維力等諸多領域的能力，並重視啟發學生培養生活品味力，深化學生對於生命關懷力的體認，以契合本校重視實務應用的優良傳統，以及學生未來畢業後的實務需求。
description.en: This course, "Practical Application of Chinese Language", is designed for the students of the University of Science and Technology. It is based on the practical application in the future work and life. Based on the Chinese language ability of the previous 12 years before the university, the curriculum design is oriented towards the application of multiple practices, with the construction of students diverse communication and expression in needs of the  future work as the main, including information gathering ability, information application ability, presentation production ability, writing ability , self-promotion, oral communication, interview writing, idea exposition, innovative thinking, and many other areas, and attaches great importance to inspiring students to cultivate their taste in life, deepening students' understanding of practical use of Chinese in the future.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1. 極限與連續，2. 導數及其應用，3. 不定積分與定積分，4. 超越函數及其反函數，5. 積分法則，6. 不定型與瑕積分，7. 定積分的應用，8. 空間幾何與向量微積分，9. 偏導數，10. 重積分。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration.

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

description.zh: 瞭解微算機之基本組織架構及應用，內容包含：1.PC 之使用，2. 微電腦學習機之使用，3. 邏輯分析儀之使用，4. 組合語言之設計與除錯，5. 記憶體設計 ROM/RAM，6. 輸出入埠設計及程式控制，7. 輸出入埠應用 (鍵盤介面、LED 顯示介面)，8.A/D、D/A 介面設計，9. 簡單 PC 介面卡設計 (PIO 及 SIO) 介面，單晶片之設計與應用。
description.en: The experiment covers the basic architecture and application of microcomputer.The lab. work includes:1.The usage of PC2.The usage of microcomputer training machine3.Logic analysis4.The design and debug of assembly language5.ROM/RAM design6.I/O design and control 7.A/D, D/A design8.PC interfacing design9.Single-chip microcomputer system design

name.zh: 微算機原理及應用實習

notes: 訓練場代開課，下學期限 A 組選

description.zh: 瞭解微算機及介面設計之基本觀念與應用，內容包含：1. 微算機概論，2. 中央處理單元架構、程式規劃及記體模式，3. 微算機指令集及定址模式，4. 組合語言程式設計，5. 硬體介面概論，6. 記憶體介面 (ROM 及 RAM) 介面，7. 輸出入介面、中斷處理及直接記憶體存取，8. 微算機系統概述及發展系統簡介。
description.en: 1.Introduction to microcomputer2.Central processor unit 3.Microprogramming set4.Assemblylanguage programming5.Interfacing circuits6.ROM/RAM interface7.I/O operations8.Interrupt and direct memory access

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用硬體描述語言來分析與設計數位積體電路及系統，進而能培養學生具有設計積體電路的能力，課程內容包括： 1. 電腦輔助設計積體電路介紹 2. 硬體描述語言程式設計與模擬介紹 3. 積體電路設計軟體之介紹及使用 (Verilog) 4.FPGA ( Xilinx ) 的設計 5. 專題設計
description.en: This course is trained the student to use hardware-description language tools for the analysis and simulation of integrated circuits(digital & analysis) .Therefore, the student have the design capability of integrated circuit. The contents of this course: 1.Introduction to the Computer-aided IC design 2.System design using hardware description language 3.Introduction to the computer-aided design of digital integrated circuits (Verilog) and computer-exercise 4.FPGA(XILINX)design and computer-exercise 5.Project

name.zh: 硬體描述語言程式設計與模擬
name.en: System Design Using Hardware Description Language

notes: 訓練場代開課，下學期限 A 組選

description.zh: 1. 各種感測器結構、特性及工作原理簡介。2. 各種感測器之測量系統及轉換界面電路設計。3. 監控系統及感測器應用設計。
description.en: 1.Introduction of sensors.2.Measurement system of sensors.3.Application and design of sensors.

notes: 訓練場代開課，下學期限 B 組選

description.zh: 課程重點：(1) 藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2) 使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3) 熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4) 透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。

The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 本課程以培養學生家具視圖、製圖及空間想像能力，並以電腦繪圖進行家具設計、開發。透過電腦授課方式，以電腦設計軟體（AutoCAD）之學習，習得平面、三視圖、立體圖、剖面圖等之基本繪圖法，進而學習家具三視圖、家具剖面圖、家具結構圖和尺寸標註等之家具工程製圖畫法。
description.en: This course is to help students to develop skills on recognizing and Furniture drawing, as well as AutoCAD. Furniture engineering drawing includes Cross-sectional view, Structure drawing and Dimensioning.

description.zh: 包括製作模型所需用之各種機械設備操作、使用工具、紙模型、工業油土等之加工技術
description.en: Training students to operate some basically equipment such as bench work, sheet metal, machining, and welding machines safely and correctly, giving them the primary skills in model making.

notes: 設計館地下一樓 B02 木工廠

description.zh: 練習設計構想草圖速繪法；從基本幾何形體至複雜產品、空間循序漸進；常用材質（木質、金屬、透明材質、石材及皮革等）之表現技法；產品精描、透視圖法、三視圖、爆炸圖、組立圖等之精描，說明圖板及各種畫材（麥克筆、粉彩、色鉛筆及水彩）等之應用。
description.en: This course put emphasis on offering students having enough skills on :1.Abilities to sketch their idea visible to the others.2.Coloring design sketches to let the drawings have better comprehensibility.3.Good skill for Renderings. Medias for this course shall include markers, pastels water colors and color pencils.

description.zh: 傢俱塗裝為傢俱外觀重要的製程，本課程教導學生了解傢俱塗裝專業知識與生產規劃，主要包括: 1. 傢俱塗料的種類。例如：刷塗、噴塗、滾筒塗佈、簾幕式塗佈 2. 傢俱塗裝方式的選擇。 3. 傢俱塗裝作業方式，塗料乾燥、固化及硬化方法。 4. 不同塗裝方式在外觀與維護上之影響。 5. 塗膜缺陷與對策。 6. 塗裝線規劃。
description.en: Furniture finish is an important part of appearance, This course will help students to understand furniture finishing and Manufacturing process, include 1. Furniture coatings category. ex: brushing、spraying、roller coating、curtain coating… 2. How to choose best way of coating process. 3. Coating process, curing, drying and hardening of paint. 4. The appearance and maintain in different finish. 5. Coating defects and solution. 6. Production planning.

description.zh: 本課程之目的為使學生瞭解生產計畫與管制的基本概念，訓練學生對於生產計畫與管制的各項方法，制度設計及改善等具有基本認識，並應用管理科學及作業研究於生產計畫與管制之研究發展。本課程包括下列主題：生產計畫與管制概論、產品設計與發展、預測、來源需求規畫、生產排程、總排程、存貨管理、豐田式管理、專案規畫與管理等。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to introduce the fundamental concepts of production planning and control. In addition, applications of management science and operations research in production control and planning are also provided. This course is consisted of the following subjects: introduction, product design and development, forecasting, resources requirement planning, production scheduling, total scheduling, inventory management, Toyota management, and project management.

description.zh: 從展示空間之規劃過程讓學生了解規劃的基礎概念及空間設計之實務，以達到展示之最佳效果，例如施工設計、色彩、照明、空間結構、展示佈置以及櫥窗設計等展示效果。
description.en: This course develops the students understanding of the exhibition design process and practical experience such as lighting, coloring, space structure, arrangement and construction, and show window design.

description.zh: 解說大型相機多重焦距調整和影像形狀的修正及變形功能，如何配合造型設計及啟發造形創意，使學生熟悉大型相機操作方式及攝影技巧，由忠實表現學生自己設計成品的表面材質感。形狀。體積。色彩等等，再深入到表現。特色。機能。價值感等發揮實用攝影行銷及展示的功效.
description.en: Through the detailed explanations of multiple focusing adjustments and image correcting methods of the view camera (large format camera) to help students master the operation of the camera and many other photo taking techniques. The students shall be able to take picture of their own designing product (showing the right material quality, surface texture, the form, volume, weight and color).Furthermore, the students are requested to learn, to make full use of their knowledge as to show the character, function, value and uniqueness of their product in the picture for the purpose marketing promotion and exhibition.

notes: 設計館 301 電腦教室、攝影棚

description.zh: 課程重點：(1) 藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2) 使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3) 熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4) 透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。

notes: 二 / ABC；彭朋群 胡貝禎 (各 1.5 學分)

description.zh: 先修課程：4401011 或負責教授同意力、質量與加速度，質點運動學，質點動力學，功與能，衝量與動量，剛體運動，剛體系的動力學。
description.en: Relations of Forces、Masses and Acceleration, Kinematics of Particles, Dynamics of Particles, Work and Energy, Impulses and Momentum, Kinematics of Rigid Bodies, Dynamics of Systems of Rigid Bodies.

description.zh: 汽車材料的構成，金屬、非金屬、非鐵金屬、燒結合金及複合材料等在汽車分野上的應用，汽車材料的動向。
description.en: Compositions of Automotive Material，Applications of Metal、Nonmetal、Nonferrous Metal、Sintered Alloy、Composite materials for Automotive、Automotive Materia

description.zh: 本課程引入程式設計的觀念與方法，程式設計語言以 C 語言為基礎，於熟習基本程式語法後，再導入 C++ 程式語言。內容著重邏輯思考與程式設計能力之訓練，同時輔以程式設計過程所應注意之程式結構、偵錯、可攜性、軟體工程的基本概念，使修習者得以奠定程式設計之基礎。
description.en: This course introduces to the students the basic computer programming concepts.Syntax and semantics of the C and C++ programming languages will be introduced.Topics cover the methods for analyzing problem statements, designing computersolutions, effective methods of program design using structured programming notionsof sequence, selection, and iteration structures.

description.zh: 課程重點：(1) 藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2) 使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3) 熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4) 透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through reading materials appropriate to their levels; (2) to develop reading skill by giving explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as analysis of basic writing skill; (3)to  familiarize students with useful expressions in conversation and build up their confidence in cross-cultural communication; (4)to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

description.zh: 本課程「國語文實務應用」，專為本校科技大學的同學而設計，以未來於職場（生存）與人生（生活、生命）之實務應用為教學標的。     奠基於大學之前 12 年的國語文能力上，課程設計朝向多元實務應用的方向，以建構學生多元溝通表達之職場需求力為要，包括資訊蒐集力、資訊應用力、簡報製作力、文案企劃力、自我宣傳力、口語溝通力、採訪寫作力、理念論述力、創新思維力等諸多領域的能力，並重視啟發學生培養生活品味力，深化學生對於生命關懷力的體認，以契合本校重視實務應用的優良傳統，以及學生未來畢業後的實務需求。
description.en: This course, "Practical Application of Chinese Language", is designed for the students of the University of Science and Technology. It is based on the practical application in the future work and life. Based on the Chinese language ability of the previous 12 years before the university, the curriculum design is oriented towards the application of multiple practices, with the construction of students diverse communication and expression in needs of the  future work as the main, including information gathering ability, information application ability, presentation production ability, writing ability , self-promotion, oral communication, interview writing, idea exposition, innovative thinking, and many other areas, and attaches great importance to inspiring students to cultivate their taste in life, deepening students' understanding of practical use of Chinese in the future.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1. 極限與連續，2. 導數及其應用，3. 不定積分與定積分，4. 超越函數及其反函數，5. 積分法則，6. 不定型與瑕積分，7. 定積分的應用，8. 空間幾何與向量微積分，9. 偏導數，10. 重積分。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration.

notes: 桃分署上課；因場地關係，該班僅提供能源系同學上課

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

notes: 桃分署上課；因場地關係，該班僅提供能源系同學上課

description.zh: 窗型空調、箱型空調、中央空調、除濕空調、及各型空調實習、運輸空調實習、各種空調過程實驗及空氣性質點之測定、空調熱回收裝置。
description.en: To familiarize students with practice of room air conditioner, package air conditioner, central air conditioning system, dehumidifying air conditioning system, etc. To provide students with abilities of experiment of air conditioning processes and measurement of air properties.

description.zh: 各種壓縮機起動控制、順序控制、溫度控制、濕度控制、水流量控制、外氣控制、焓值控制、氣壓控制、電動控制、電子控制等實習。
description.en: To familiarize students with practice of compressor control, sequence control, temperature control, humidity control, flow control, outdoor air control, enthalpy control, and pneumatic control, electric control, electronic control on HVAC systems.

description.zh: 本課程實習內容主要包含冷凍空調節能技術；動態節能模擬分析；無塵室節能技術；潔淨能源 (諸如太陽能、風能、燃料電池等) 技術。
description.en: This practice course mainly contains: energy-saving technology in refrigeration and air conditioning, dynamic energy simulation, energy-saving technology in cleanrooms and clean energy (such as solar energy, wind energy, and fuel cell, etc).

description.zh: 以套裝軟體學習電腦輔助繪圖，及如何將此技術應用於冷凍空調領域。
description.en: Computer Aided Drawing For HVAC & R Engineering by using package software.

description.zh: 本課程講授工業電子相關之原理，包含：1. 基本元件簡介、2. 電晶體開關裝置及其應用、 3. 電子元件及其應用、 4. SCR 與 TRIAC、 5. 感測器原理與應用。本課程並包含下列實習單元：R-L-C 元件，諧振電路，濾波電路與變壓器，零件運用與電路檢修，感測器應用。
description.en: This course provides design-oriented approach to the understanding of electronic devices, circuits, and system used in industry. Both lectures and laboratory exercises are provided.

description.zh: 本課程介紹電磁之基本原理及定律，並講解各種電機、變壓器之特性、理論、及控制方法，透過實習課程使同學明瞭機器驅動所用之動力其電功與機械功之轉換原理與控制進而可自行操作及維護。
description.en: An introduction of the basic principles of the electro-magnetic theories. Topics include the characteristics, theories and control algorithms of the various electrical equipment and transformers.

description.zh: 商用冷凍系統電路元件介紹、商用冷凍冷藏設備電路裝配、冷媒管路系統裝配、故障判斷及排除。
description.en: Introduction of electric circuits of commercial refrigeration systems, electric circuit of commercial refrigeration facilities, installation of refrigerant piping system and trouble shooting.

description.zh: 箱型空調機電路裝配、冷卻水管路施工安裝、冷媒管路系統裝配、故障判斷及排除、冷媒更換。恆溫恆濕空調系統控制電路配線、中央空調系統試陣調整、水量與風量平衡調整、TAB 操作。
description.en: Electric circuit of air handler, installation of coolant piping, installation of coolant pipe system, trouble shooting, refrigerant replacement, constant electric circuit of air-conditioner control for constant temperature and humidity, test and balance of central units, test and balance of water and air flow.

description.zh: 能源在日常生活中以很多型態呈現，大量的能源使用於汽車動力、食物與用水加熱、產品製造、發電及其他不同事務。使用傳統能源會排放空氣污染物，因而引起鄰近地區、區域、跨國境空氣污染問題，甚至是全球的環境衝擊效應。本課程將檢視能源使用現況及其衍生的環境議題，並且探討能源使用之趨勢。傳統能源 (如煤、石油、天然氣、核能等)、及再生能源 (如太陽能、水力、風能、地熱能等) 及能源效率等內容，都將於課程中介紹
description.en: Energy enters our everyday lives in many ways. Prodigious amounts of energy are used to power automobiles, heat food and water, manufacture products, generate electricity, and perform various other tasks. The use of traditional energy will emit air pollutants that may result in regional air pollution problem as well as global effects. In this course we will look at the current energy situation, its environmental implications, and try to determine the patterns of energy use. We will look at energy use as coal, petroleum, natural gas, nuclear energy, and renewable energy, such as solar energy, hydroelectric

description.zh: 本課程主要是介紹 H∞的理論及如何以精簡易懂的數學工具掌握強健控制設計，進而認識 H∞控制的物理特性及優缺點，並其他控制方法作比較。
description.en: This course mainly introduces the theory of H∞ and how to utilize the mathematical tool to design the H∞ controller. Besides, the physical meaning and the comparison with others control methods are also will be introduced in this course.

description.zh: 認識科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

description.zh: 本課程強調具知識內涵的設計過程，以知識的探討與研究為手段，豐富設計創意的發展。透過工業設計的理論、方法及程序，以研究的手段形成設計決策，或以實證的方式將研究成果應用於設計實務。本課程藉由設計主題或產學合作進行實際演練，應用新科技與新材料的發展，並探討生活型態與市場的需求，研發創新型態的產品或服務。其中應用的方法包括：問題分析，需求研究，方案評估，設計檢核，價值呈現及績效評價。
description.en: This course provides an approach to Knowledge Embedded Design.‘Creating’ is the ultimate stage for learning, critical thinking and combining all acquired knowledge to produce something new and unique. Advanced Product Design (III) educates students to identify and resolve design problems – innovatively. In order to identify, expand and test user’s requirement, research and design process will be carried out under the instruction, which includes Identify the Problem, Investigation Research, Identify Possible Solution, Choose Best Solution & Develop Detail, Implement Solution, and finally, Test & Evaluation.

description.zh: 設計與生活是自古以來就相生相隨的一項行為，生活型態的變化，對生活器具的要求也就不同。故本課程主要在探討研究設計行為與生活型態之關係，進而提供新思維作為設計行為之參考。
description.en: Design is a part of human life. Demands in design changes withlifestyle. This course focuses on general review of ifestyle research that is practically constructive in the process of product planning and design.。

notes: 設計 603；須修畢 113-1 高齡者產品設計研究才可修此課

description.zh: 本課程通過理論介紹使用者經驗設計（UX Design）的概念，然後將 UX Design 方法導入實踐和操作與完成研究工作。課程目的是訓練學生在研究端的流程，諸如素描、框架結構、UI 可視化、原型設計、以及用戶測試和優化等能力。最終學生可基於這些能力來利用解決 UX 的實際設計問題。
description.en: The course via the theories to have an introduction on the concepts of user experience designs (UX Design), and then import the UX Design method to practice and operation. The purposes are training students' ability of user research, sketch, framework structure, UI visualization, prototype design, and user test and refine et al. Moreover, students can base on these ability to utilize on solving the practical design problems of UX.

description.zh: 本課程以越南語教學為主，培養學生的聽、說、讀、寫能力，以達到溝通的目的，增進學生對越南文化的認識與興趣，提供學生越南語的基礎知識，越南經貿、觀光文化及越語字母拼音教學，讓學生在學習越語的同時，深入了解越南文化，協助學生拓展東南亞的就業版圖。
description.en: This course will help students have basic communicate skill, basic knowledge of Vietnamese (including alphabet, phonetic and grammar) and better understand Vietnam culture.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討如何將 AI 技術應用於語用學研究，著重多元社會情境與語境之下之語言使用分析與詮釋。此課程將深入淺出討論語用學核心理論部分，並結合 AI 大型語言模型 (例如: GPT, Gemini, 以及 Claude 等) 實際操作，讓學生親自學習辨識、分析與評估各種自然語言表現，包含言語行為 (speech acts)、會話隱含 (conversational implicature) 及禮貌策略 (politeness strategies) 等現象。本課程以專題式學習融合理論與實務，幫助同學從全新的 AI 驅動視角進行語用學研究，在分析人類真實語言互動行為之外，更同時能了解 AI 生成文本在語用能力方面的優勢與局限。
description.en: AI & Pragmatics is a graduate-level course that explores how artificial intelligence (AI) can enhance the study of pragmatics by focusing on the analysis and interpretation of language use across diverse social and contextual settings. Students will integrate core theories of pragmatics with hands-on experience using Large Language Models (e.g., GPT, Gemini, and Claude) to identify, analyze, and evaluate key pragmatic phenomena such as speech acts, conversational implicatures, and politeness strategies—and, more importantly, apply these skills to real-world language tasks. Built around project-based learning, the course blends theory with practice, preparing students to conduct research in pragmatics from a fresh, AI-driven perspective. It equips them not only to analyze authentic language interactions but also to critically assess the strengths and limitations of AI-generated texts in terms of pragmatic competence.

description.zh: 1. 基本觀念，2.RC 主動網路之元件與子網路，3. 具有零元件及任意元件的主動網路分析，4. 雙極接面電晶體之線性應用，5. 運算放大器之線性應用，6. 網路靈敏度，7. 分解，結構，及靈敏度，8. 二階濾波電路之合成與設計，9. 梯形濾波電路之合成與設計，10. 信號流程圖之濾波電路之合成與設計
description.en: 1.Fundamental Concepts, 2.Elements and Sub-networks of RC-Active Networks, 3.Analysis of Active Networks using Nullors, 4.The Bipolar-Junction Transistor and Linear Applications, 5.The Operational Amplifier and Linear Circuit Applications, 6.Network Sensitivity, 7.Decomposition, Structures, and Sensitivity,8.Biquadratic Filter Synthesis and Design, 9.Ladder Filter Synthesis and Design, 10.Filter Design using Signal-Flow Graph Simulation

name.zh: RC 主動電路之分析與設計
name.en: Analysis and Design of RC-Active Circuits

description.zh: 配合高科技的應用，電力系統亦朝高科技發展，以便對用戶提供高品質、高可靠性、高效率及高安全性的電力，其中所面臨的問題很多必須加以解決，此有賴於良好的電力網路規劃，及對問題的分析探討。為此，本課程針對現今及未來電力系統的發展，探討其網路之規劃及分析，主要內容包括：1. 先進電力網路之發展趨勢分析（包括發電、輸電、變電、配電等各級網路之發展趨勢分析）2. 先進電力網路規劃之範圍及要項（包括系統架構、線路及設備之型式、數量、容量、位置及配置方式等）3.	負載特性之變化分析及負載成長預測（包括一般負載及科技產業負載）4. 先進電力網路規劃所需考慮之因數及相關條件分析（包括負載需求、能源供應、環保要求、經濟因素、區域特性、社會因素、建設成本、運轉維護、未來成長、、、）5. 先進電力網路之最佳規劃模式建立（包括目標（成本）函數及限制條件之探討及模式之建立）6. 先進電力網路最佳規劃之解空間及求解方法探討（包括單目標最佳規劃及多目標最佳規劃）7. 台灣電力網路規劃之特點 8. 實際案例之演練及解說
description.en: Electric power system is developing with high technology for supplying customers power with high quality, reliability, efficiency and security.  Many problems associated with this development should be solved, which are very relied on the well planning and analysis for the power network. For this, the course is aimed to the network planning and analysis for the today's and future's power system developments. The main contents of this course are:1.The development tendency of advanced electric power network,2.Scope and important items associated with electric power network planning,3.	Load characteristic variations analysis and load growth forecasting,4.Factors and related conditions to be considered for the advanced electric power network planning,5.Construction of the model of optimal advanced electric power network planning,6.The study of the solution space and searching methods for optimal advanced electric power network planning,7.The features of Taiwan electric

name.zh: 高等電力網路規劃及分析
name.en: Advanced Electric Power Network Planning and Analysis

notes: 綜科 514, 限職電機所電力組學生修課

description.zh: 本課程將透過介紹及研讀創新服務的標竿案例，以了解創新服務的本質與實質效益。學生將透過共同研討與分組實作的的方式，針對不同場域及技術的創新服務，透過資源整合的方式，提出具體的創新服務專案，並提出其評估的方法。
description.en: This course will provide the student basics knowledge and practical benefits of the innovative services through benchmark case introduction and study. Students will collaborate to each other to propose practical innovation service project proposal in the aspect of resources management, technology applications, service mechanism and associated assessment methods  in various domains.

notes: 排進修部教室，限 30 人

description.zh: 新興數位學習媒體的開發日新月異，再加上資訊存取的高效能數位化，使得科技輔助的數位學習之路更形寬廣、開闊。電子書於知識傳遞的介面上，扮演了關鍵性的角色。傳統上以行為理論推衍而來的人機介面學習模式已然過於狹隘，因為數位時代中的學習者角色已由被動轉為主動，由行為導向轉為認知導向、意義導向以及脈絡導向，而資訊的解讀與詮釋更從單一性、制式化轉為開放性、多元化。對於致力於創新數位學習科技的開發者而言，針對學習者的學習模式重新加以審視是極為迫切的，如此方能以嶄新的角度去開發新的學習潛能和發展性。本課程目的即是從心理學、認知科學及資訊處理的角度來探討新型數位學習模式以及其應用方法，並探討數位學習成效評估系統的建立方案，形塑電子書於知識鴻海的無限可能。
description.en: The rapid development of digital learning and emerging learning technologies, as well as effective information storage platforms, have made traditional learning theory insufficient and less productive in guiding instructional designs for contemporary educational development. New available learning technologies therefore call for the need to re-consider new learning theories. For that, the definitions and mechanism of learning and learners have become more multidimensional and open-ended, instead of being singular and standardized in conventional perception. For those who are devoted to create new technological applications for learning, it is no doubt critical to construct new mechanism of learning in current highly digitized era. This course will discuss relevant cognitive learning theories from research in psychology and education, and contemplate how new e-learning solutions can be evaluated.

notes: 排進修部教室，限 30 人

description.zh: 課程內容包含：系統定義、資料分析、迴歸方法、系統元件數值模建立、數值計算方法、系統性能模擬及數值佳化方法。
description.en: The course materials are as follows: definition of system, analysis of data, regression method, modeling equipment, numerical calculation, simulation and optimization of system

description.zh: 本課程著重冷凍系統和空調系統能源的分析，探討構成系統的主要元件－壓縮機、蒸發器和冷凝器的耗能，和各泵、冰水盤管、空調箱及風／水管路系統的能源耗損，進而對整個系統運轉時的效率予以檢討。最後提出各種改善方法，節約能源和減少電力契約容量的技術，以使學生具有節能省電的正確理論觀念和實務技術。
description.en: This lesson is focused on the energy analyses of refrigeration systems and air-conditioning systems. The operating defects of compressors, evaporators andcondensers are to be investigated. Also the energy consumption's of pumps, fan coils air-handling units and duct/water systems are studied. The over all performance of the entire system is thus discussed. Several methods to improve the shortages and the techniques to energy conservation and electricity demand cut-down will be proposed.The students should understand correctly the theory of energy conservation and thetechnology to improve the systems.

description.zh: 專利文件是最具價值的技術研發資訊。課程除了介紹專利相關基礎知識之外，並以有效的專利檢索分析技藝洞悉未來技術趨勢，特別是針對化學工程、生物科技、生醫材料、智能程序工程、綠色能源、光電半導體、奈米材料等系所研究發展領域的專利文件。透過有系統的分析及視覺化的圖示呈現企業有用的專利情報 (intelligence)，並找到其中潛在的商業利益。
description.en: Patent documents are the most valuable technology research and development information. In addition to introducing the basic knowledge of patents, the course also uses effective patent retrieval and analysis techniques to gain insight into future technological trends. The technical fields of patent documents are especially aimed at chemical engineering, biotechnology, biomedical materials, chemical process and intelligent engineering, green energy, optoelectronic semiconductors and nanomaterials. Present the useful patent intelligence of enterprises through systematic analysis and visual diagrams, and try to find the potential commercial benefits.

name.zh: 化工類專利分析與策略運用
name.en: Analysis and strategic application of chemical engineering patents

description.zh: 本課程介紹近代電化學的分析方法。 介紹內容包含電位法、循環伏安法、安培法、光譜電化學法、旋轉環碟電極法、及其他近代電化學的分析方法。
description.en: Introduction the principles and applications of modern electroanalytical methods. Introduction the theory and application of polarography, potentiometry, cyclic voltammetry, Amperometry, spectroelectrochemistry, RRDE, and other modern electroanalytical techniques.

description.zh: 本課程探討無線通訊系統基頻演算法設計，主要包含多輸入多輸出傳輸系統中接收端與傳送端之聯合最佳化問題。課程綱要：1. 基本矩陣運算 2. 多輸入多輸出接收機設計 3. 多輸入多輸出天線選擇 4. 多輸入多輸出前置編碼器設計
description.en: This course aims at the baseband algorithm design for wireless communication systems. Much attention will be focused on the joint multiple-input multiple-output (MIMO) transceiver optimization.Course outline:1.Basic matrix operations.2.MIMO receiver design.3.MIMO antenna selection.4.MIMO precoder design.

description.zh: 電影、電視、漫畫書、視頻遊戲等其他藝術形式對於塑造人類文化和日常生活的影響力日益增加。本課程旨在藉由觀看電影、電視等其他形式的流行文化，來探索東西方流行文化在過去及現代的本質與意義。
description.en: Alternative forms of art – movies, television, comic books, video games – have become increasingly influential in shaping our culture and our daily lives. By watching films, televisions, and other forms of pop culture, this class explores the nature and significance of pop culture in the past, modern time of the West and East.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 讓學生了解並熟悉工程軟體於工程問題分析之應用，培養解決實務及研發問題的能力。課程概述：在具備固體、熱流等力學及有限元素分析理論的基礎上，利用 3D 繪圖與高階有限元素分析整合軟體，將工程實務問題作實體建模，並進行物理行為模擬分析與理論驗證，包括靜態、動態、落下測試、穩定性、疲勞、熱傳、非線性、多重物理參數耦合及最佳化等問題之實例演練。最後以實際研發專題作為本課程學習之體驗。
description.en: On the basis of applied mechanics such as the solid, thermal fluid and finite element analysis theory, utilize the computer engineering software, which the 3D computer aided drawing is integrated with finite element analysis, to simulate the practical engineering problem. The physical behaviors such as static, dynamic, dropping testing, stability, fatigue, heat transfer, nonlinearity, coupled multi-physics and optimization, etc. can be verified and predicted through the simulating analysis for several practical model. The course will give both comprehensive experience and knowledge of a special researching topic finally.

name.zh: 高等電腦輔助工程分析

description.zh: (1)「田口方法」介紹 (2) 完整的「田口方法」，包含以下三個主題：(a) S/N 比之理論基礎及進階應用；(b) 直交表之理論基礎及進階應用；(c) 變異分析。(3) 應用「田口方法」進行專案研究，並繳交專案主題與報告。
description.en: (1) The course gives step-by-step to explaining the "Taguchi Method" for the students.     (2) The course gives the fully "Taguchi Method" for the students during a short time, which including three topical subjects:  (a) The basic theory of S/N ratio and its advanced applications.  (b) The basic theory of Orthogonal Arrays and its advanced applications.  (c) Analysis of Variance (ANOVA)  (3) Students will use the "Taguchi Method" to proceeding a project study, and hand over their theme and report of project.

name.en: Taguchi Method on the Quality Design

description.zh: 微加工程序含 MUMPS，打樣、沉積、蝕刻；設計工具含 MEMCAD, Matlab, EM software, and Ansys 等；應用例含壓力感測器、加速度計、探針卡、微波元件、生物晶片等；最後介紹封裝與測試技術。
description.en: 1. Introductions of Microsystem 2. Micromachining Processes include MUMPS, Pattern, Deposition, Etching 3. Design Tool include MEMCAD, Matlab, EM software, and Ansys 4.Applications include Pressure sensor, Accelerometer, …,etc, -probe card and other, RFMEMS, BioMEMS 5.Packaging and testing.

description.zh: 有鑑於電子商務的迅速發展，本課程在幫助此課程學習者能夠應用免費的軟體和網路服務，製作一個電子商務的商業網站，無論同學自行創業或到公司服務，都可以因應電子商務的業務需求。
description.en: This course will teach the students to learn to build up an e-commerce website .

description.zh: 本課程係提供本系同學施工安全與災害方面之基礎，以為將來投身土木建築工程時之重要技能，其課程內容包含：擋土開挖、基礎施工、假設工程、結構主體工程、裝修工程、山坡地等施工安全與災害防制等。
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the protection of fire engineering， It will cover:  Safety and disaster preclusion of  opencast ground、foundation construction、hypothesis engineering、structure engineering、fitment engineering   etc.

description.zh: 模糊理論基本觀念模糊數學模糊多屬性決策分析應用實例分析
description.en: The course introduces fuzzy theory and related models to improve the effectiveness of disaster management. The main content includes concepts of logic, fuzzy set, fuzzy relation, fuzzy math, fuzzy logic, calculation principles, and some important performance evaluation methods and application algorithms which are often used with fuzzy theory. The course may help students not only touching the key concepts of fuzzy theory, but also independently doing deeper research in fuzzy, evaluation, and management field.

name.zh: 模糊理論在災害管理之應用
name.en: Application of Fuzzy Theory in Disaster Management

description.zh: 本課程主要探討與各種維生線系統有關的管理技能，諸如公路、通訊、給水管線、電力線、橋樑、瓦斯管線等系統均將加以說明。
description.en: This cause will introduce all kind of management thechniques with infrastructure system, such as highway, communication utility,water supply utility,power utility, bridge and gas utility.

description.zh: 說明古蹟及歷史建築之研究價值，研究對象，探討由古蹟建築之時代、地理位置、社會文化環境內容、人為環境內容、組織建築空間與構築建築實體，及其影響因素等各層面來進行研究之過程與方法。透過國內外相關理論與實物的個案分析，現場觀摩與實習，研討台灣古蹟保存與再利用的理論，法源與技術。
description.en: This course will systematically discuss various themes of historical building, including the building's architectural characters and the influent sectors of that social cultural circumstance (ex. historic period, site, or person…) . By way of the reading and discussing about the relative theory and works, that student can understand the though and technique of the architectural preservation and reuse.

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生深入探討最新的室內環境議題與人體健康間的關係，使學生具備創造健康室內環境的相關知識及操作能力，主要授課要點如下：1. 以單一類型的建築室內環境為探討主題；2. 探討環境影響人體健康之最新研究議題；3. 進行跨領域合作提出共同改善之策略及方法；4. 學習各項環境量測儀器之原理、操作與判讀能力；5. 具備診斷與改善特殊室內環境議題之專業知識及操作能力。
description.en: In this course students are going to be taught how to discuss the relationship between indoor environment quality and human healthy in order to promote students' recognition and abilities to create healthy indoor environment.Contents :1. The indoor environment of single type of building.2. The relationship between the artificial environment and human health.3. Providing some strategies and methods to improve indoor environment quality through cooperating with other science field.4. Learning how to use instruments to evaluate indoor environment quality.5. Learning how to diagnose and improve the special topics of indoor environment quality.

name.en: Special Topics on Indoor Environment Quality

description.zh: 針對學生在建築設計及都市規劃基礎訓練之後，有異於前期以技術性思考，改以都市開發及宏觀政策及微觀個案財務之角度切入建築及都市開發之議題，以輔助學生建立都市開發與都市型態間關連性之整合概念。
description.en: After the technical approaches in urban planning and building design, the financial and political issues are to be taken into consideration in urban affairs. The micro- financial plan in developments and the macro- political issues in housing policy would be introduced to the urban planning practice.

name.en: The housing Development and urban Policy

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在強化有關都市土地使用規劃與成長管理的理論與經驗，以及增進對都市整體建成環境未來的瞭解。因此，本課程將藉由對都市土地使用規劃與成長管理經驗特有與一般課題、對策及創新作法的基礎瞭解，以培養理論與實務的知能。故本課程主要內容包括： 一、都市成長對土地的需求。 二、土地使用管制與倫理。三、都市變遷與規劃。四、都市成長管理與政府的角色。 五、達到都市成長管理的可能途徑。 六、都市成長管理體系內的必要措施：例如環境、交通運輸、住宅、財政、風險、信託、組織等。 七、結論。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to further our knowledge about current theories and experiences with urban land use planning and growth management, and the struggle to define the collective future of our built environment. By identifying unique as well as common issues, problems, and innovations in urban growth management experiences, our hope is to improve planning practice. To examine these concerns, the course includes: 1. Land needs for urban growth. 2. Land use control and ethics. 3. Urban change and planning. 4.Growth management and the role of government. 5. Alternative approaches to growth management. 6. Balancing planning needs in growth management systems: environmental, transportation, housing, financing, risk, trust and organization concerns. 7. Conclusions

name.zh: 都市土地使用計畫與成長管理
name.en: Urban Land Use Planning and Growth Management

description.zh: 專題討論照明與視覺心理等課題，期能對於照明相關知識能有深刻了解，並能藉課堂的研討與文獻閱讀等方法提出見解。課程內容包括永續發展之綠色照明、照明與色彩、眩光之評價、光源之新發展、燈具之美、高齡者之照明環境、防災照明、視覺與輝度分布、照明耗能評估指標與基準、晝光利用、照明之控制、道路照明與安全、戶外照明與都市環境、光污染等。
description.en: The topic is discussed with lighting and visual psychology that expect to understand some knowledge about lighting, by the method of discussion and technical literature reading to provide an opinion about lighting. The course are including green lighting for sustainable development, lighting and color, the evaluation of glare, the new tendency of lighting source, the beauty of luminair, lighting for venerable age, lighting for fire control, visual and luminance distribution, evaluation index and base of lighting energy, the advantage of daylight, lighting control, road lighting and safety, outdoor lighting and urban environment, lighting pollution.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹領導與組織管理的理論與實務。課程目的有四個：(1) 了解組織領導與管理的內涵；(2) 討論領導與組織管理的理論與實證發現之間的差異；(3) 對實務界人士提供具體建議；(4) 將領導與管理的技巧應用到生活面。
description.en: This course focuses on the theory and practice of leadership and management in organization. Its purpose is threefold: (1) To gain an understanding of what the content of organizational leadership and management is; (2) to effectively combine the basic concepts of leadership and organization management and empirical findings and discuss the discrepancies and implications; (3) to discuss practical implications for business management and (4) to apply the basic ideas of leadership and management in daily life.

description.zh: 曲軸沖床、各單元件之設計與構造要點、剪斷原理與過程、變形原理、成形現象、引伸原理、力的分析、設計實例、連續引伸的設計程序。
description.en: Structure and design Fundamental element of craft, punching, principle and process of steaming cutting, principles of deformation, forming phenomena, design and manufacturing process of continuous stretching.

description.zh: (1) 塑膠材料種類、特性、及其應用；(2) 塑膠的成形方法；(3) 塑膠射出成形品設計；(4)   射出成形機的分類與規格；(5) 射出成形模具的機構；(6) 射出成形模具零件規格與選用；  (7) 成形品的缺陷與對策。
description.en: (1) Plastic materials types, characteristics, and applications. (2) Forming methods of plastic materials. (3) Part design of injection molding. (4) Classification and specification of injection molding machine. (5) Mechanism of injection mold. (6) Injection mold's parts and part selection. (7) Defects and strategy.

name.zh: 塑膠射出成形與模具實務
name.en: Plastic injection molding and mold practices

description.zh: 全球化製造體系的形成，使得合約製造商必須以更積極的態度，從策略面出發，藉由各種電腦與網路的技術，整合內部與外部的流程與資訊，打造數位化工廠。數位化製造的目的，是希望藉由資訊透明化，提升整個製造體系的競爭優勢。課程的設計，是以概念介紹的方式，說明數位製造的應用現況與相關技術。本課程的內容包括：數位化製造概論、數位化製造實例說明、商業模型分析、知識管理、企業知識入口網站、產品資料管理、交易系統、資料倉儲、企業資訊入口網站、工作流程管理、最新數位化相關技術介紹。
description.en: Globalization has lead contract manufactures more active on seeking new strategies to survive. To increase competition, new technologies, such as computer and network technology, have applied. Computer and network technology can integrate internal and external information to establish a so-called "e-factory." This course covers different issues related to e-Manufacturing, such as Concept of e-Manufacturing, Case Study, Business Model Analysis, Knowledge Management, Enterprise Knowledge Portal (EKP), Product Data Management (PDM), Concept of Trading Systems, Concept of Data Warehousing, Enterprise Information Portal (EIP), Workflow Management, State of the Art Technologies, etc.

description.zh: 機械手臂基礎理論，內容包含座標轉換、機械臂運動學、反運動學、動力學、軌跡規畫、機械臂設計、機械臂控制、機械臂的程式語言等。
description.en: It is a fundamental course concerning the theories of robotic manipulators. Topics contain frame transformations, manipulator kinematics, inverse kinematics, dynamics, trajectory planning, manipulator design, control of manipulators, robot programming languages.

description.zh: 自動化應用基礎，自動化規劃設計︰1. 個體冷凍設備 2. 冷凍系統運轉操作 3. 冷凍倉儲管理自動化 4. 低溫冷凍應用自動化
description.en: Fundamentals and design of automation applications include:1. Unitary refrigeration equipment.2. Refrigerating system operation.3. Refrigerated warehousing management.4. Low temperature refrigeration application.

description.zh: 1. 傳輸線理論 2. 等量傳輸網路之合成 3. 集體元件微波電路 4. 半集總濾波電路之合成 5. 耦合傳輸線之物理參數 6. 耦合傳輸線濾波器 7. 指狀濾波器 8. 梳型濾波器
description.en: 1.Transmission line theory2.Synthesis of commensurate line networks3.Lumped element microwave circuits4.Synthesis of semi-lumped filter curcuits5.Physical parameters of coupled lines6.Coupled lines filter7.Interdigital filter8.Combline filter

description.zh: 本課程主要以公平交易法與營業秘密法之立法目的、沿革及發展趨勢為出發點，探討此二法律在規範對象、方法及競合等之差異；深入分析公平交易法與營業秘密法之內涵，進而個別探討公平交易法與營業秘密法等之智財權利行使的課題。
description.en: This course majors in the purpose, evolution, and development trend of legislation on the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act, with an attempt to differentiate between the two Acts in respect of objects, approaches, and choice of law that the Acts apply to.  In this course, analyses are also made, in depth, on the essence of the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act, together with discussion, respectively, on implementation of Intellectual Property Rights involved in the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act.

name.zh: 營業秘密法與公平交易法專題研究
name.en: Monographic Study on Trade Secret Act and Fair Trade Act

description.zh: 本課程將介紹申請專利的相關程序規定，以及辦理其他有關專利事項，例如：申請文件、分割與改請、專利權讓與、提起舉發等等，必須符合之程序要件；另外也將介紹專利迴避設計之觀念與實務練習。
description.en: This course will introduce the procedural regulations for patent applications and other patent-related matters, such as filing documents, divisional applications, amendments, patent assignments, and oppositions, along with the procedural requirements that must be met. Additionally, the course will cover the concept and practical exercises for patent design-around strategies.

name.zh: 專利程序審查與專利迴避設計
name.en: Patent application procedures and patent design around

description.zh: 1. Matlab/Simulink 簡介 2. 控制系統建模 3. 線性時變控制系統分析 4. 可觀測性與可控制性 5. 李亞普若夫穩定度分析 6. 曲線擬合與系統建模 7. 控制器設計 8. 數值範例演練
description.en: 1. Introduction to Matlab/Simulink2. Modeling of Control Systems3. Analysis of Linear Time-Varying Control Systems4. Observability and Controllability5. Lyapunov Stability Analysis6. Curve Fitting and System Modeling7. Controller Design8. Numerical Examples

description.zh: 本課程藉由跨領域合作，配合設計思考課程、及在地產業、藝師等產業接軌協作，引導學生發掘與分析產業與市場需求，進行產品開發與服務活動設計，培育大學生社會責任。
description.en: In this course, students will develop their ability to identify and analyze industry/market requirements, product development and service design skills, and sense of university social responsibility. Methods employed include interdisciplinary cooperation, design-thinking training, and collaborations with local industries and craft professionals.

name.zh: 跨域文創商品設計開發
name.en: Interdisciplinary Design and Development of Creative Products

notes: 設計館地下 1 樓 B03 金工廠

description.zh: 課程內容包括：微細加工基本概念，傳統加工方式之比較，各種加工方式比較與市場分析， 微細放電加工， 微細超音波加工 (超音波簡介與應用)， 微細電解加工與電解拋光， 鐳射加工於微細加工的應用， 微細探針加工法簡介，微細探針的應用， STM，AFM 的應用與簡介。
description.en: Introduce the concepts of micromachining. compare and analyse micro machining method,   Micro-EDM, Micor-USM, ECM, Laser machining, Micro probes machining and applications, Introduction of STM，AFM.

notes: 職機電 / 製科合開，綜科 110-1, 時間異動 (一) or (五) A-C 節

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹領導與組織管理的理論與實務。課程目的有四個：(1) 了解組織領導與管理的內涵；(2) 討論領導與組織管理的理論與實證發現之間的差異；(3) 對實務界人士提供具體建議；(4) 將領導與管理的技巧應用到生活面。
description.en: This course focuses on the theory and practice of leadership and management in organization. Its purpose is threefold: (1) To gain an understanding of what the content of organizational leadership and management is; (2) to effectively combine the basic concepts of leadership and organization management and empirical findings and discuss the discrepancies and implications; (3) to discuss practical implications for business management and (4) to apply the basic ideas of leadership and management in daily life.

description.zh: 策略管理主要是幫助製造業與服務業高階管理者作決策。一般而言，這門課程主要協助學員們具有策略思維與整合能力。學員可在策略管理學習過程活學活用，更能融合所學應用於管理決策中。此門課也採用適當的製造業與服務業個案研討來幫助學員學習、研讀與熟悉策略管理的運作，以達成此門課的目標。授課主題包括研討策略管理的本質與整體架構，瞭解組織所處環境 ， 分析外部環境之時機和危機， 剖析內部組織之優劣勢 ， 探討企業不同層次之應對策略，整合策略的執行與治理等。
description.en: Strategic management deals with the decision making in manufacturing and service industry at the top management level. Generally, this course provides students with strategic thinking and knowledge integration. With case studies in manufacturing and service industry, this course also helps students learn, study, and understand the process of strategic management well to achieve the goals of the course. Topics in this course include the essence and whole framework of strategic management, in what circumstances an organization has been, analyses on the opportunities and threats of external environment, the strengths and weaknesses of internal organization, application strategies of companies at different levels, implantation on integration strategies and so forth.

description.zh: 論文寫作。
description.en: Thesis writing.

description.zh: 此課程旨在說明決策理論之基本觀念，及其在真實世界裡相關決策問題之分析。使學生具備了解並建構決策問題，建構並推估決策之不確定性，以及建構並評估效用模式之能力。
description.en: This course provides an overview of the basic concepts of decision theory and their applications on the real-world decision problems. Students will learn about the problem identification and modeling, the modeling and estimation of the associated uncertainty, and modeling and evaluation of the utility function.

description.zh: 本課程旨在概述人工智慧的應用及其對製造業和物流業的影響。 隨機器學習、深度學習、啟發式演算法和其他人工智能方法的發展，相關新興技術的應用越來越多地被應用於製造和物流行業以提高決策能力。本課程將通過介紹人工智慧的基礎知識和實際應用之案例研究闡述使用人工智慧技術對於產業決策之幫助。學生將深入了解人工智慧技術及其在製造和物流領域如需求預測、生產計劃、調度、質量控製或運輸的潛在應用，課程內容亦將應用 ChatGPT 做為開發製造物流問題求解方法之輔助工具。通過本課程，學生將了解人工智慧對製造和物流系統之影響及現況，評估使用人工智慧之益處和局限性，並了解人工智慧對於相關產業之改善。
description.en: This course provides an overview of AI application and its impact on manufacturing and logistics. Emerging technologies like machine learning, deep learning, heuristics are being utilized to enhance decision-making capabilities. The course covers the fundamentals of AI, practical case studies, and its benefits. Latest AI technologies and their potential applications in manufacturing and logistics such as demand forecasting, production planning, scheduling, quality control, or transportation will be introduced. ChatGPT will be used as an auxiliary tool for developing problem-solving methods. The course develops the ability to analyze the impact of AI on manufacturing and logistics systems, assess benefits and limitations, and evaluate AI improvement for related industries.

name.zh: 人工智慧跨域製造及物流之應用
name.en: AI Applications in Manufacturing and Logistic

description.zh: 論文寫作。
description.en: Thesis writing.

description.zh: 本課程是教導學生金融科技的基本概念，使學生能夠建立金融科技的創新應用。內容包括：金融科技概論、金融科技商業模式、P2P 借貸、虛擬貨幣、雲端服務、第三方支付、群眾募資、P2P 匯兌、區塊鏈、跨境電商、程式交易、機器人理財與期末專題製做。
description.en: This course is to instruct students the basic concepts of financial technology and to enable students to develop innovative applications of financial technology. The contents include introduction to financial technology, business models of financial technology, P2P lending, virtual money, third-party payment, crowd funding, P2P remittance, blockchain, cross-border e-commerce, program trading, and robotic financial advisory.

description.zh: 本課程設計為讓初學者了解並能分析在現今市場環境下，企業所面臨的財務問題。課程涵蓋企業資本評價的基本模型，包含企業金融資產的定價模式、實體資產評價與投資專案分析、資本結構分析，以及其他企業在資金管理與財務規劃預測的相關議題。再者，本課程以深入淺出方式介紹投資決策之基本觀念及理論架構。將財務投資的觀念與原理加以運用於重要的投資決策。透過本課程之學習，促使投資人能獲取合理的投資報酬或擊敗大盤，領先各基金之績效，以制訂出正確的長短期投資決策。
description.en: The course develops theoretical framework for understanding and analyzing major financial problems of modern company in market environment. The course covers basic models of valuation of corporate capital, including pricing models for primary financial assets, real assets valuation and investment projects analysis, capital structure and various types of corporate capital employed, derivative assets and contingent claims on assets. Furthermore, the major goal of this course is to help students understanding the basic principles and theories of investments. It can give students the skills to conduct a sophisticated assessment on investment decisions. Through the learning of this course, prompting investors to be able to obtain a reasonable return on investment or beat the market, ahead of the performance of each Fund, in order to work out the correct short and long term investment decisions.

description.zh: 論文寫作。
description.en: Thesis writing.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹大數據分析緣起與理論基礎，大數據分析與企業經營間之獲利關聯，並輔以大數據分析案例讓學員對於大數據應用有更深層的認識與啟發。
description.en: The big data opportunity, extracting insight from an immense volume, variety and velocity of data, in context, beyond what was previously possible, will be addressed in this course. Applications for big data analytics could include smarter healthcare, multi-channel, finance, computer log analysis, homeland security, traffic control, telecom, search quality, manufacturing, trading analytics, fraud and risk, retailing, among others.

name.en: Big Data Analytics and Industrial Applications

description.zh: 本課程設計為讓初學者了解並能分析在現今市場環境下，企業所面臨的財務問題。課程涵蓋企業資本評價的基本模型，包含企業金融資產的定價模式、實體資產評價與投資專案分析、資本結構分析，以及其他企業在資金管理與財務規劃預測的相關議題。目的在讓參與者對『財務決策對公司表現和價值的影響』有更深刻的認識。
description.en: The course develops theoretical framework for understanding and analyzing major financial problems of modern company in market environment. The course covers basic models of valuation of corporate capital, including pricing models for primary financial assets, real assets valuation and investment projects analysis, capital structure and various types of corporate capital employed, derivative assets and contingent claims on assets. It provides necessary knowledge in evaluating different management decisions and its influence on corporate performance and value.

description.zh: 新創事業面臨許多的挑戰，包括：避與大企業競爭，找到存活的依據、從無到創立強勢品牌、創立或擴張自有市場 / 消費者據點等。本課程旨在啟發修課同學創業的興趣並協助修課同學思考新創事業如何平衡有限資源以迎向挑戰。 新創企業已發展成熟的企業是不一樣，主要是因為新創事業的資源有限，創業家必須同時兼顧許多面向並回應顧客所需。本課程旨在協助修課同學思考創建企業應注意的各種面向評估自己的創能力。 課程包含了三大部份，第一部份為創新與創業概念啟發；第二部份在辨別市場機會與發展市場；最後第三部份為新創事業行銷管理。行銷活動能夠將企業的產品及服務傳遞給顧客；並將產品、服務及企業本身的資訊帶到市場上；將顧客資訊回饋給企業。創業行銷管理能夠幫助創業者向潛在投資者及企業夥伴銷售創意以獲得資源，也讓創業家透過創新的商業手法來充分利用稀少的資源。
description.en: Managers must have excellent leadership skills in order to A start-up company has lots of challenges, such as: niche market located and brand diffusion. The course intends to encourage the participant to become an entrepreneur and handle with these challenges. A start-up company is different from well-developed one due to limited resources. Usually, to response customer’s requirement, the entrepreneur must take multiple criteria into consideration simultaneously. The course includes three parts. Part I build students’ concept about innovation and entrepreneurship. Part II is about market identification. Part III is about marketing management of a start-up company. The efficient marketing activities enable business to approach customer’s requirement, to bring their customer product (or services) and get customer’s feedback. Also, the marketing management helps entrepreneur to reach their potential investor to obtain more resources.

description.zh: 本課程將以團隊合作模式進行三項活動競賽 (寰騰動、寰騰撼、寰騰賽)。課程設計為兩天的內容：包括 1. 隊呼競賽 2. 闖關活動 3. 哈佛個案競賽以呼應 EMBA 應具備的四到 (學到、交到、玩到、做到)。
description.en: This course is to develop the ability to lead business transformation and team building in the dynamic economic environment. There are three parts in this course: 1. Cheerleading contest 2. Team building activities 3. Harvard Business School case contest. The goals of this course are four must does in EMBA( to Learn, Make friends, practice, and achieve).

name.en: 本課程將以團隊合作模式進行三項活動競賽(寰騰動、寰騰撼、寰騰賽)。課程設計為兩天的內容:包括1.隊呼競賽2

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生建立足夠的知識與技能在論文寫作以及企業研究方法上。課程內容主要分為兩部分， 第一部分將首先介紹論文架構開始，緊接著介紹如何撰寫緒論、文獻探討、研究方法、結果分析、討論、結論及參考文獻，配合課程中的實際案例討論，指導學生應注意的論文格式與規範。本課程的第二部分則在介紹目前企業研究上常用的各種數量方法，各種數量方法的原理及其應用的領域將以實際案例解釋說明，透過上課解說演練、討論、作業、報告等方式使學生熟悉各種研究方法。主要教授的研究方法包括層級分析法、TOPSIS、決策實驗分析法、模糊理論、約略集合及基本多變量分析。所教授的各種的研究方法將以 Excel 進行分析與計算演練，本課程學習結束後後，學生應當能具備足夠的能力撰寫論文並了解使用各種研究方法於企業問題解決。
description.en: The objective of this course is to help students build up the knowledge/skills in thesis writing and business research methods. The content of the course can be divided by two major parts. The first part will begin from the introduction of thesis structure, followed by how to write the introduction, literature review, methodology, result analysis, discussion, remarking and reference. The format of thesis will also be illustrated by some class examples. The second part of the class will begin from the introduction of different quantity methods commonly used in business research methods today. The categories of research methods and their applicable problems are then presented using real-world case studies. Students can learn different decision-making tools through lectures, discussion, assignment, term-projects and in class practices.

description.zh: 論文寫作
description.en: Thesis writing

description.zh: 本課程旨在為學生提供永續能源與淨零碳規劃管理的實務知識基礎，包括認識全球能源與環境的現況、掌握再生能源技術和能源效率提升的策略，並深入分析臺灣在永續能源發展上的政策、市場以及實際案例，並包含淨零碳規劃管理基礎概論與淨零碳盤查規範與程序概要，讓學生對於永續能源與淨零碳規劃管理策略有更詳盡的認知。本課程也將淨零碳規劃管理師考試流程和考試重點彙整至學習中，目標是協助學生通過淨零碳規劃管理師能力鑑定，使其能與產業接軌。
description.en: This course aims to provide students with a practical knowledge base in sustainable energy and net-zero carbon planning and management. It includes understanding the current global energy and environmental landscape, mastering renewable energy technologies, and strategies for enhancing energy efficiency. The course offers an in-depth analysis of Taiwan's policies, market, and practical cases in sustainable energy development. It also covers the fundamentals of net-zero carbon planning and management, along with an overview of the standards and procedures for net-zero carbon auditing. The course integrates the examination process and key points of the Net-Zero Carbon Planning and Management Certification, aiming to help students pass the certification and connect with the industry.

name.zh: 永續能源與淨零碳規劃管理策略
name.en: Sustainable Energy and Net-Zero Carbon Planning and Management Strategies

description.zh: 本課程將邀請產、官、學界知名人士，以演講或座談的方式，與 EMBA 學生交流溝通及討論。利用這些知名人士的實務經驗與學養，來啟發 EMBA 學生的創意與想法。
description.en: This course will invite the renowned individuals in business, government, and universities to exchange ideas and opinions with the EMBA students through invited speech or seminar. The idea is to utilize the practical experience and knowledge possessed by these individuals to inspire the innovation and thinking of EMBA students.

notes: 碩二必修，台北集中上課，國際會議廳

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生在論文寫作以及企業研究方法上建立足夠的知識與技能。課程內容主要分為兩部分，第一部分將介紹論文架構，緊接著介紹如何撰寫緒論、文獻探討、研究方法、結果分析、討論、結論及參考文獻，配合課程中的實際案例討論，指導學生應注意的論文格式與規範。本課程的第二部分則在介紹目前企業研究上常用的各種數量方法，各種數量方法的原理及其應用的領域將以實際案例解釋說明，透過上課解說演練、討論、作業、報告等方式使學生熟悉各種研究方法。主要教授的研究方法包括層級分析法、網路程序分析、TOPSIS、VIKOR、灰關聯法、決策實驗分析法、模糊理論、約略集合及基本多變量分析。所教授的各種的研究方法將以 Excel 進行分析與計算演練，本課程學習結束後，學生應當能具備足夠的能力撰寫論文並了解使用各種研究方法於企業問題解決。
description.en: The objective of this course is to help students build up the knowledge/skills in thesis writing and business research methods. The content of the course can be divided into two major parts. The first part will begin from the introduction of thesis structure, followed by how to write the introduction, literature review, methodology, result analysis, discussion, remarking and reference. The format of thesis will also be illustrated by some class examples. The second part of the class will begin with the introduction of different quantitative methods commonly used in business research methods today. The categories of research methods and their applicable problems are then presented using real-world case studies. Students can learn different decision-making tools through lectures, discussions, assignments, term-projects, and in-class practices. The main methods include AHP, ANP, TOPSIS, VIKOR, DEMATEL, Gray Relation Methods, Fuzzy Set Theory, Rough Set Theory, and some basic multivariate

notes: B-2 班 碩一必修 (個案寫作或論文寫作 2 選 1)，集中上課

description.zh: 隨著科技不斷進步，人工智慧技術逐漸成熟，無論在生產流程、企業管理及分析決策等方面都陸續開始導入生成式 AI 工具，應用場景橫跨企業營運、數據應用以及產品與服務創新等。本課程將介紹生成式人工智慧原理並結合實作方式，透過實際案例和演練來教授生成式 AI 技術和應用。課程內容包括人工智慧的基礎知識，如深度學習、自然語言處理、圖像處理、推薦系統、預測分析等，並導入人工智慧在企業管理和決策、金融、數據分析、智慧製造等領域等應用案例。課程中將結合 Azure OpenAI 雲端服務資源，並以人工智慧跨域應用學習模式來跨域應用至數據分析、智慧運算、智慧製造及物流、商情預測、經營管理、金融等領域，以培育學生具備領先同儕之人工智慧跨域應用專業能力。
description.en: This course introduces the principles of generative artificial intelligence and combines practical exercises regarding the technology and applications of generative AI through real case studies and drills. The course covers fundamental knowledge of AI, such as deep learning, natural language processing, image processing, recommendation systems, predictive analytics, and introduces the application cases of AI in enterprise management and decision-making, finance, data analysis, intelligent manufacturing, among others. The course will also utilize Azure OpenAI cloud service resources and cross-domain application learning mode to cultivate students’ technical abilities in AI cross-domain applications, spanning across data analytics, intelligent computing, intelligent manufacturing and logistics, business forecasting, management, finance, etc., leading them to stand out among their peers.

name.zh: 生成式人工智慧於企業實務之應用
name.en: Application of Generative Artificial Intelligence in Enterprise Practice

description.zh: 這門課將深入探討從巴黎協定到 Net Zero 的全球淨零碳排發展歷程，並闡述碳訂價政策工具的概念與國際主要實踐。透過企業淨零實務分享，學生將了解目標訂定、策略制定、管理制度建立以及追蹤管理等步驟。課程還涵蓋 ISO 14064 碳盤查和 ISO 14067 產品碳足跡的概念與實作，並結合企業減碳經驗分享。最後，課程將介紹數位轉型在碳管理上的應用，包括資訊治理和低碳轉型等技術，旨在培養學生對於全球氣候行動及企業永續發展的深刻理解與實踐能力。
description.en: This course explores the evolution towards global net-zero carbon emissions, from the Paris Agreement to Net Zero, along with the concept and implementation of carbon pricing policies. Through real-world examples, students learn how companies set goals, develop strategies, and establish management systems for achieving net-zero emissions. Additionally, the course covers carbon footprint verification and product carbon footprinting practices, alongside insights from businesses reducing carbon emissions. Finally, it examines the application of digital transformation in carbon management, fostering understanding of climate action and corporate sustainability.

name.zh: 永續發展與淨零碳管理
name.en: Sustainable Development and Net Zero Carbon Management

notes: (群組 3) 工業與科技管理 (台北上課)

description.zh: 為因應瞬息萬變的金融投資環境，期許學生具備宏觀的投資管理知識，本課程主要本課程結合資訊工具與軟體運用、以深入淺出方式介紹投資決策之基本觀念及理論架構，並搭配財務軟體、財金資料庫、與財金資訊網站的應用。藉由這些資訊工具與技術，將財務投資的觀念與原理加以運用於重要的投資決策。課程內容架構包括：(1) 財務與投資學原理；(2) 資料庫的使用；(3) 財務軟體的操作；(4) 財務與投資個案分析。透過本課程之學習，促使投資人能獲取合理的投資報酬或擊敗大盤，領先各基金之績效，以制訂出正確的長短期投資決策。
description.en: In response to the rapidly changing environment of financial investments, expecting that students have knowledge of macro investment management, this course combines information and software tools to use, the major goal of this course is to help students understanding the basic principles and theories of investments. By mixing explanation and implementation using financial software and database, it can give students the skills to conduct a sophisticated assessment on investment decisions. The major topics include the following: (1) principles of investments, (2) financial database, (3) financial software, and (4) case study in investments. Through the learning of this course, prompting investors to be able to obtain a reasonable return on investment or beat the market, ahead of the performance of each Fund, in order to work out the correct short and long term investment decisions.

name.en: Application of Investment Decision and Information

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在介紹人工智慧技術在各項金融主題的實務應用，內容包括：人工智慧介紹、金融概念介紹、機器人理財、大數據徵信、智慧借貸、5G 金融服務、區塊鏈金融服務、智慧物聯網金融、加密貨幣金融等。
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the smart finance. Topics include artificial intelligence introduction, finance introduction, robo-advisory, credit analysis, AI lending, 5G financial services, blockchain financial services,  AIoT finance, cryptocurrency finance.

description.zh: 瞭解常見之演算法及其分析，1.Complexity、Big-Oh 符號，2. 演算法之分析，3. 集合、優先佇列，4. 樹、平衡樹，5. 排序演算法，6. 搜尋演算法，7. 圖形演算法，8. 幾何演算法，9.NP-complete problems 之理論及對策。
description.en: 1.Complexity 2.Analysis of algorithms3.Set,priorty queue4.Tree,Balanced tree5.Sorting algorithms6.Search algorithms7.Graph algorithms8.Geometry algorithms9.NP-complete problems

description.zh: 資料表示法：定點系統 (Fixed Point System)，浮點系統 (Floating Point System)，2. 運算工作：定點之加減乘除，快速之運算，浮點運算，3. 指令與控制：各種指令介紹，中斷，硬體控制單元設計 (Hardwired Control)，微程式控制單元設計 (Microprogramming)，4. 記憶系統：記憶體之層次 (Memory Hierarchy)，虛擬記憶系統 (Virtual memory)，快速記憶 (Cache Memory)。
description.en: 1.Data representation 2.Logic operations3.Command and control 4.Memory organization 5.Processor organization

description.zh: 1. 簡介；2. 組合邏輯系統設計；3. 標準組合邏輯模組；4. 算術組合模組與網路；5. 順序邏輯系統設計；6. 標準順序邏輯模組；7. RTL 系統；8. 資料及控制子系統；9. 微處理器設計。10. 數位系統設計之原則與方法；11. ASM (Algorithm StateMachine) Chart 之應用與序向邏輯方法：傳統式合成法、多工器控制法、One-Hot 法、ROM-Based 法；12. ASIC 所需之基本 SSI/MSI 元件；13. 使用 SSI/MSI 基本元件解決邏輯問題；14. 採用數位系統設計之原理與方法，利用 ASIC 之基本元件，再配合基本閘設計 ALU、CPU 控制器、中斷控制器、DMA 控制器等 IC 元件；15.Bit-Slice 計算機設計；16. 微程式設計；17.Hardwired CPU 設計。
description.en: 1. Introduction; 2. Design of combinational systems; 3. Standard combinational modules; 4. Arithmetic combinational modules and networks5. Design of sequential network; 6. Standard sequential network; 7. Register transfer level (RTL) systems; 8. Data and control subsystems; 9. Design of a microcomputer; 7.Principles of digital system design; 8.ASM chart 9.SSI/MSI component 10.Application of ASIC component 11.Bit-Slice machine 12.Hardwared CPU design.

description.zh: 1. 印刷電路板介紹 2. 線路圖繪製 3.PCB 佈局基本觀念介紹 4. 印刷電路板設計工具介紹 5. 高速數位 PCB 佈線設計的流程與基本原理 6. 阻抗特性、反射現象、串音現象的介紹 7. 高速數位 PCB 的量測技術介紹 8. 案例說明
description.en: 1.Introduction to PCB. 2. Introduction to Schematics Circuits 3. Introduction to concepts of PCB layout 4. Introduction to PCB Design tools 5.Flow and Fundamentals of High-Speed Digital PCB Layout Design 6. Introduction to Impedance Characteristics, Reflections, and Crosstalk 7. Measurement Technology of High-Speed Digital PCB 8. Case Study

name.zh: 高速數位 PCB 設計導論
name.en: Introduction to High-Speed Digital PCB Design

notes: 訓練場代開課，下學期限 A 組選

description.zh: 1. 程式語言類別介紹 2. 物件導向與資料抽象化 3. 類別與方法 4. 訊息﹐實例與初始化 5. 繼承 6. 靜態與動態繫結 7. 多型性 8. 發展環境及工具 9. C++ Java Smalltalk 簡介 10. 應用程式實例介紹
description.en: 1.Programming Language Paradigms  2.Object-Orientation and Data Abstraction  3.Classes and Methods 4.Messages, Instances, and Initialization 5.Inheritance  6.Static and Dynamic Binding7.Polymorphism  8.Environment and Tools  9.Introduction to C++, Java, and Smalltalk 10.Case Study

notes: 訓練場代開課，下學期限 A 組選

description.zh: 1. 資料表示法：定點系統 (Fixed Point System)，浮點系統 (Floating Point System)，2. 運算工作：定點之加減乘除，快速之運算，浮點運算，3. 指令與控制：各種指令介紹，中斷，硬體控制單元設計 (Hardwired Control)，微程式控制單元設計 (Microprogramming)，4. 記憶系統：記憶體之層次 (Memory Hierarchy)，虛擬記憶系統 (Virtualmemory)，快速記憶 (Cache Memory)。
description.en: 1.Data representation 2.Logic operations3.Command and control4.Memory organization5.Processor organization

notes: 訓練場代開課，下學期限 B 組選

description.zh: 讓學生瞭解製造業與服務業行銷的觀念和趨勢。主要包括以下課題：（1）消費者行為（2）市場區隔（3）產品策略（4）行銷通路（5）網路行銷（6）促銷（7）關係行銷。
description.en: The course teaches the student marketing concepts and trends. The topics will be covered: (1) consumer behavior, (2) marketing segmentation, (3) product strategy, (4) marketing channels, (5) online marketing, (6) relationship marketing.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於建構產業分析之思維架構及洞悉市場發展之研究能力，以因應市場之快速變遷，並介紹學生瞭解總體經濟與產業景氣分析，公司經營財務報表分析，投資標的評價與技術分析。透過研究方法之介紹及預測手法之教導並輔以個案實作以達其效。
description.en: The objective of the course is to construct the infrastructure of industry analysis and to build up the research capability for changing market development. The fundamental analysis of macro economy and business cycle, financial statement analysis and investment valuation methods are also studied. By introducing the methodologies and forecasting tools, the case study is implied in this class.

description.zh: 近年來企業為面對市場的競爭與快速改變，其多以大型專案方式同時來執行幾個專案，如：產品研發、行銷規劃、生產製造及教育訓練等專案活動。大型專案管理要如何才能在企業統一的願景和策略下展開，來提升企業的競爭優勢與創造價值。因大型專案的時程較長且範圍較多，其不確定性和混淆性也較高，以致其成功的關鍵除須具備專案的執行的效率外，還須具有在於對變化的反應能力。本課程內容將著重於介紹大型專案規劃流程中所使用的技能與工具說明外，並安排學生企業內大型專案實務案例做為課堂內探討。其目的在訓練學生如何面對高混淆性和高不確定性的大型專案，使企業內大型專案管理有系統的方法執行與圓滿完成。
description.en: Recently, in order to face the challenges and rapid changes of the competition, enterprises often need have a large-scale project to execute several projects at the same time, such as product development, marketing planning, manufacturing, and education and training. How can large-scale project management be carried out under the unified vision and strategy of the enterprise? New capabilities and cultural consensus are needed to enhance the enterprise's competitive advantage and create value. Due to the long duration and large scope of large-scale project, its uncertainty and confusion are also high, so that the key to its success must be not only the efficiency of project execution, but also the ability to respond to changes.This course will focus on introducing the skills and tools used in the large-scale project, and arranging large-scale project practical cases in student companies as classroom discussions. Its purpose is to train students how to deal with large-scale project wit

notes: (群組 1) 經營與策略管理 (關聯群 3)

description.zh: 1. 訊號時域與須域特性的量測  7.  類比訊號的取樣與重整 2. 比式濾波器的設計          8.  脈幅調變系統 3. 雙旁波帶 AM 調變系統        9.  脈碼調變系統 4. 單旁波帶 AM 調變系統        10. 數位通頻傳輸 5. FM 調變系統與解調          11. 訊號多工的傳送與接收 6. 鎖相迴路檢波器的設計      12. 通訊系統的設計與模擬
description.en: The lab course is designed for supplementing the lecture course'Communication Systems' and 'Digital Communication Systems'.sStudents can learn the principles and practive of analog and digital communication systems from laboratory experiments and projects.The cintents include1.measuremnts of signals in time domain and frequency domain 2.design of analog filters3.double sideband AM systems4.single sideband AM systems5.FM systems6.dessign of phase-locked-loop detectors7.sampling and regeneration of analog signals8.pulse amplitude modulation(PAM)systems9.pulse coded modulation(PCM)systems10.digital passband transmission11.multiplexing systems12.design and simulation of communication systems

description.zh: 瞭解各種數位邏輯閘，基本數位電路之特性及設計和應用，內容包含：1.TTL，CMOS 邏輯閘之特性實習，2. 組合邏輯電路設計實習含：算術電路，比較器，解碼器，編碼器，多工器，解多工器等，3. 序向邏輯電路設計實習含：正反器，計數器，記錄器，及移位暫存器等，.D/A 和 A/D 之轉換實習，5. 利用 ASM 圖之電路設計實習，6.PLD 設計實習，7.ORCAD/VST，PSPICE 數位電路模擬實習，8. 專題實作。
description.en: Experiments with various logic gates and basic digital circuits.Contents include:1.TTL and CMOS lab.2.Combinational logic circuit design lab.3.Sequential logic circuit design lab.4.D/A and A/D converters lab.5.PLD design lab.6.Digital circuit design lab.7.Special projects.

notes: 訓練場代開課，下學期限 B 組選

description.zh: 瞭解程式語言的基本結構，並以 C 語言為主要實習對象，其內容包含：1. 程式語言簡介：介紹各種程式語言及其特性，並對 C 語言之發展沿革架構及持點詳加討論，2. 資料型態：介紹 C 語言之資料型態及各種運算子，3. 基本輸入：介紹各種輸出入函數及輸出入實習，4. 流程控制：介紹指定指述，選擇敘述及迴圈敘述，並做實習，5. 前置處理：介紹前置處理觀念及程式實作，6. 函式：介紹主副程式及實作，7. 陣列與字串：介紹各種陣列之特性及字串與陣列之關係，並做實習，8. 結構型態：介紹結構，列舉及同位資料型態及應用實習，9. 指標：介紹指標之觀念及應用實習，10. 位元運算：介紹位元運算及應用實習，11. 檔案處理：各種檔案之介紹及檔案輸出入函數，12. 鍵盤與游標控制：介紹鍵盤、游標之控制及字元之特性，並作相關實習，13. 繪圖與音樂：介紹文字模式及繪圖模式函數，並作實習，14. C 語言與物件導向：介紹 C++ 與物件導向之關係，及物件與類別之基本定義，並作相關實習。
description.en: Understand the basic structure of programming languages. C language is used for the practice. The course includes: 1. Introduction to programming languages: introduce various programming languages as well as their properties and discuss the history, the structure and advantages of C language. 2. Data types: introduce the data types and operators of C language. 3. Basic Input and Output: introduce various input and output functions and work on their practices. 4. Processes Control: introduce assignments, select statements and loop statements and work on their practices. 5. Preprocess: introduce the concept of the preprocess and work on the programming practice. 6. Functions: introduce the main program and subroutines. 7. Array and strings: introduce the properties of various arrays as well as the relations between strings and arrays and work on their practices. 8. Structure data types: introduce structure data types and work on the practices. 9. Pointers: introduce the concept of pointe

name.en: Understand the basic structure of programming languages.

notes: 訓練場代開課，下學期限 A 組選

description.zh: 瞭解電路元件之基本特性及其組合電路之分析方法，內容包含：1. 電路元件：電壓及電流源，主動元件，2. 電路特性：歐姆定律，柯希荷夫電壓與電流定律等，3. 一階及二階電路：電路之微分方程描述及各種輸入信號之響應，4. 穩態分析與頻率響應：分析電路之頻域，5. 電腦輔助電路分析：如使用 SPICE 工具。
description.en: 1.Introduction to linear circuit analysis2.Resistve circuit 3.Kirchhoff laws4.Thevenin and Norton theorem5.First and second order circuit6.Node and loop analysis7.Steady state response and analysis8.SPICE tool

notes: 訓練場代開課，下學期限 B 組選

description.zh: (1) 半導體二極體特性曲線；(2) 半導體二極體之應用：整流器，濾波器，剪波器，箝位器，倍壓器；(3) 發光二極體驅動電路；(4) 齊納二極體穩壓電路；(5) 雙極接合面電晶體之辨別與參數量測；(6) 雙極接合面電晶體輸入及輸出特性曲線；(7) 雙極接合面電晶體直流偏壓電路；(8) 共射極放大電路；(9) 射極隨耦電路；(10) 共基極定電流源電路；(11) 場效電晶體之辨別與參數量測；(12) 場效電晶體轉移及輸出特性曲線；(13) 場效電晶體直流偏壓電路；(14) 場效電晶體放大電路；(15) 整流及濾波電路；(16) 偏壓分析與設計；(17) 基本放大器 (共射，共基，共集模式，共源，共汲，共閘等); (18) 串級放大器；(19) 差動放大器。
description.en: (1)The characteristic curve of PN diode; (2)The applications of PN diode : Rectifier, Filter, Clipper, Clamper, and Voltage-doubler; (3)Light Emitting Diode drivers; (4)Zener diode for voltage regulation; (5)The identification of BJT's leads and the measurement of b parameter; (6)The input and output characteristic curves of BJTs; (7)DC biasing circuits for BJTs; (8)Common-Emitter(CE) amplifiers; (9)Emitter-follower(EF) circuits; (10)Common-Base(CB) constant current sources; (11)The identification of FET's leads and the measurement of device parameters; (12)The transfer and output characteristic curves of FETs; (13)DC biasing circuits for FETs; (14)The amplifying circuits of FETs; (15)Retifier circuit and Filter; (16)Bias analysis and design; (17)Common Emitter amplifier, Common base amplifier, Common collector amplifier; (18)Differential amplifier.

notes: 訓練場代開課，下學期限 B 組選

description.zh: 使學生熟悉，應用程式設計之環境、方法、及原則，內容含：（１）作業系統與應用程式之關係（２）視窗環境（３）網路環境（４）整合設計學生將窗撰寫完整之應用程式
description.en: To familiarize the student with the environments,methodologies,and principles of application softwaredesign.Topics include :1.Run-time environments2.Window environments3.Networking environments4.Integrated designThe student will write application programs with actual function.

notes: 訓練場代開課，下學期限 B 組選

description.zh: 本課程內容包括邏輯閘的特性與功能測試，能利用積體電路完成各種基礎邏輯電路的組裝及設計，並能利用電子儀器進行量測、檢修。探討最佳化組合邏輯之演算法，可規劃邏輯元件，組合邏輯之 VLSI 設計，使用 MSI 與標準電路元件設計多層邏輯，使用閘陣列設計，循序邏輯之元件，循序邏輯之分析與合成，VLSI 之設計與測試技巧，各種 CAD 軟體工具介紹。基礎邏輯閘實驗、組合邏輯實驗、加法器及減法器實驗、組合邏輯應用實驗、正反器邏輯實驗、循序邏輯電路應用實驗。
description.en: 1.Properties and function tests of logic gates. 2. Implementations of and designs of basic logic circuits using ICs. 3.Algorithms for the optimization of combinational logic circuits. 4.Programmable logic devices. 5.VLSI design of combinational logic circuits. 6.Multi-layer logic circuits using MSI and standard circuit  elements. 7.Gate array design. 8.Sequential Logic components. 9.Analysis and synthesis of sequential Logic circuits. 10. Technologies of VLSI design and test. 11. CAD software tools. 12.Basic logic gate experiments. 13.Combinational logic experiments. 14. Adder and subtractor experiments. 15. Combinational logic application experiments. 16. Flip-flop experiments. 17. Sequential circuit application experiments.

notes: 訓練場代開課，下學期限 A 組選

description.zh: 噪音基礎，噪音分析實驗法，汽車噪音法規與標準，基本噪音控制程序，車輛噪音與噪音控制基本，引擎噪音與控制，車輛噪音源，車輛噪音與改良，心理聲學與最佳化
description.en: Fundamentals of Acoustics, Experimental Methods of Acoustic Analysis, Automotive Noise Legislation and Standards, Basic Noise Control Procedure, Basics of Vehicle Noise and Noise Control, Engine Noise and Its Control, Vehicle Noise Sources, Vehicle Noise and Its Refinement, Psychoacoustic Analysis and Optimizations.

description.zh: 資料庫應用實務課程的目的在研習資料庫管理技術及其在企業的應用。本課程方向包括：熟悉資料庫基本指令及操作方法，以實務性方式，開發一套簡易應用軟體。培養學生對資料庫軟體設計開發之能力。
description.en: Database system application course is to study the database management techniques and its applications on enterprises. The course includes ：The students can understand the operation process in order to develop the data file. The opportunity to do the practical project independently.

description.zh: 先修課程：電子軟體系統或相當之課程數位訊號處理簡介，DSP 架構與控制器硬體簡介，計時器、輸入捕捉、輸出比較，波寬調變，類比訊號轉換週邊功能與通訊架構介紹，DSP 訊號處理與控制應用。
description.en: Introduction to Digital Signal Processors, DSP architecture and integration with microcontroller, applications of DSP peripherals and communication protocols, applications of DSP to control and signal processes.

description.zh: 有關建築歷史、理論、批評、構造、營建管理等相關主題討論。
description.en: A theme topic discussion on the field of architecture history, theory, criticism, structure, construction and management, etc.

description.zh: 本課程名稱為 “環境與自然保育” 。它包括二大範疇：(1) 自然環境和自然資源的保育，(2) 自然環境的保存、維護、利用、復原及改良。它將教導學生下列主題：自然保育的基本概念（自然保育的定義、自然保育觀念的發展）、保育生物學（物種形成和滅絕、生物多樣性、物種保護的優先原則、生物入侵）、生態經濟學簡介（生態經濟學的原則、能量流與物質流分析）、自然保護區（自然保護區之概念、自然保護區的保護對象）、自然保育政策（國際自然保育策略、台灣的自然保育機構及相關法規）與自然保育運動（自然保育運動之發展、當前自然保育運動所關心的事）。整體而言，本課程期盼提升公民生態意識和環境覺知，使大家對環境保育做出更多貢獻。
description.en: The title of this course is “Environment and Nature Conservation”. It includes two categories: (1) conservation of the natural environment and natural resources, and (2) the preservation, maintenance, restoration and improvement of the natural environment. It will introduce to students the following themes: basic concepts of nature conservation, conservation biology, introduction to ecological economics, nature reservation, nature conservation policy, and nature conservation movement. As a whole, it aims to raise our citizens’ ecological consciousness and environmental awareness and thus enable them to make more contribution to the conservation of our environment.
