description.zh: 生命科學概論，重心放在人體生命科學，並強化醫學的角色。此外，中西醫結合的觀點，詮釋抗老、防癌。以身心靈養生的方式，強化預防醫學。並從人類疾病的本源性病因，根本探討。當然，如何增強免疫力，袪除自由基是主軸。在探究人體潛能、身心靈養生或疾病的本源性原因時，都必須重視「經絡」系統。總之生命是非常奧妙的，不僅只物質面，更要重視心靈層面，中西醫整合方向，必是廿一世紀的主流。
description.en: This course focuses on human life science and emphasizes the roles of medicine on improving the life quality of human beings. It also uses the point of view of integration traditional Chinese and western medicine to interpret how to prevent the aging of body and occurrence of cancers. This course also focuses on how to keep the body, mind and spirit in the best conditon in order to prevent the occurrence of human diseases. In addition, it deeply discusses the eseential etiology of human disease and teaches audiences how to enhance the body immunity and how to get rid of free radicals. The importance of meridian system of the human body and its relationships to human potentiality, body, mind spirit and diseses are also discussed. Life is marvelous. The completeness of life depends on the saisfaction of not only the material but also menetal and spiritual needs. Integration of the traditional Chinese and western medicine to improve the life quality of human beings is the main issue.

description.zh: 創業者在新創事業時，須考慮消費者對新創事業產品 (新創產品) 之瞭解及接受程度。如果能在創業之初對消費者進行新創產品之消費者行為調查，可使新創事業在成立之初即找出目標顧客群，並分析出目標顧客的消費偏好，例如：對新創產品的品質要求、功能偏好、購買可能金額、消費通路類別等，創業者可依所瞭解目標顧客的消費偏好，規劃適當的行銷方案，而提高創業成功的機會。
description.en: Entrepreneurs should consider consumers’ understanding and acceptance of new products (innovative products) in their new ventures. If a start-up company conducts consumer behavior survey in the beginning, the new business is able to identify the target customer base from the start, and analyze the target consumer preferences, including quality requirements, functional preferences, amount of possible purchase, types of consumer access. By understanding target consumer preferences, entrepreneurs can plan appropriate marketing programs, and improve business opportunities for success.

description.zh: 新創事業面臨許多的挑戰，包括：避與大企業競爭，找到存活的依據、從無到創立強勢品牌、創立或擴張自有市場 / 消費者據點等。本課程旨在啟發修課同學創業的興趣並協助修課同學思考新創事業如何平衡有限資源以迎向挑戰。新創企業已發展成熟的企業是不一樣，主要是因為新創事業的資源有限，創業家必須同時兼顧許多面向並回應顧客所需。本課程旨在協助修課同學思考創建企業應注意的各種面向評估自己的創能力。課程包含了三大部份，第一部份為創新與創業概念啟發；第二部份在辨別市場機會與發展市場；最後第三部份為新創事業行銷管理。行銷活動能夠將企業的產品及服務傳遞給顧客；並將產品、服務及企業本身的資訊帶到市場上；將顧客資訊回饋給企業。創業行銷管理能夠幫助創業者向潛在投資者及企業夥伴銷售創意以獲得資源，也讓創業家透過創新的商業手法來充分利用稀少的資源。
description.en: Managers must have excellent leadership skills in order to A start-up company has lots of challenges, such as: niche market located and brand diffusion. The course intends to encourage the participant to become an entrepreneur and handle with these challenges. A start-up company is different from well-developed one due to limited resources. Usually, to response customer’s requirement, the entrepreneur must take multiple criteria into consideration simultaneously.    The course includes three parts. Part I build students’ concept about innovation and entrepreneurship. Part II is about market identification. Part III is about marketing management of a start-up company. The efficient marketing activities enable business to approach customer’s requirement, to bring their customer product (or services) and get customer’s feedback. Also, the marketing management helps entrepreneur to reach their potential investor to obtain more resources.

description.zh: 本課程首先說明人在宇宙中的定位、生命的可貴、一生的方向；接著說明如何鍛鍊自己成為生命的勇士；最後強調如何與天地萬物和諧相處和真愛的永不止息。課程進行方式是透過體驗活動、交流分享和有次第的講授人類共同的智慧，並安排數次的校外教學，以深入瞭解社會脈動，並運用多媒體影片教學以提升學習效果，學生每天做身心觀察學習紀錄，更可以看到生命進步的軌跡。
description.en: This course covers topics such as: the role of human beings in the universe, the dearness of life and the pursuit of life-long goals. We then discuss ways to train the students to become brave and to harmonize human beings with the nature, leading to an access to the discovery of true love.The course is realized through activity involvement, experience sharing and lectures on human wisdom. We have some extramural visits in order to understand social pulses. Multimedia teaching materials are fully utilized to enhance the teaching and learning effects. We request that all the students take note of their mental and physical improvements on a daily basis so that they could examine the progressive path of life.

description.zh: 中國文化博大精深，淵源流長，是以本課程講授內容在於介紹中國文化的特徵，如人類的起源、文化的演進、農業社會的產生、政治制度的發展、學術思想的演變、教育設施、科學與藝術的發展、工商業的發展，以及宗教信仰等，都是本課程所要探討的內容。藉此引導學生掌握古今之間的相關性，並探索中國傳統文化對台灣、東亞與世界的影響。
description.en: Chinese culture is broad and profound, so the course introduces the characteristics of it.  It includes the origin of Chinese races, the changes of the culture and the academic thoughts, the formation of the agricultural society, the developments on politics, sciences, arts, and religions……etc. The students are expected to understand the relationship between the ancient and modern China and then do further research about the influences of the traditional culture of China on Taiwan, the eastern Asia and the whole world.

description.zh: 本課程旨在欣賞篆竟藝術，認識我國歷代著名的篆竟家與優美的作品，由作品之中廣泛瞭解篆竟多樣化的美感表現與技法，並嘗試實現於創作。篆竟是我國特有的一種藝術形式，除了日常日信的實用功能之外，更普遍使用在書法或繪畫等藝術作品中。因此瞭解篆竟藝術之美，往往是面對其他藝術作品時所不可或缺的。篆竟創作必須在方寸微小的天地之內，專注構思，謹慎刻畫。如此苦心經營的體驗，同時也是十分可貴的精神陶冶。
description.en: This course enlightens students on the art, the arlists and the masterworks of seal cutting. Form the appreciation of great works, students sharpen the understanding of the versatile beauty and skills exerted in seal cutting.Seal cutting is a unique form of art in China. It is commonly applied in signets, and extensively connected with calligraphy and painting stampings and other artistic performance. Therefore, the understanding of seal cutting is supposed to be an inevitable way to unveil the curtain of Chinese art palace. Students are expected to work out the composition of seal cutting within centimeters;hence,their concentration and deliberation can be spontaneously molded.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹中華民國憲法、探討憲政體制的運作、人民權利義務的規範及相關法律的適用等問題。期能使學生認知國家民主法治的實施狀況，維護社會秩序與個人基本權利，進而體現人性尊嚴的價值。
description.en: This course focuses the discussions on the Constitution of the Republic of China,constitutional mechanism, the rights and obligations for the people and legitimate operations of the society. It is our hope that the students may have a better understanding on how the democracy is performed in our country as well as on how to preserve social security and basic human rights of the individuals-with the realization of human dignity as our extreme goal.

description.zh: 投資是有報酬和風險的，不同金融產品有不同的報酬率和風險，例如：存款報酬低風險低，期貨報酬高風險高。如何將資金做一個妥善分配，選擇合適的一組金融商品，就能避不必要的風險而得到不錯的報酬率。投資學課程可以使學習者了解如何以投資學理論評估各種金融商品的可能風險和報酬率，再依投資者經濟能力選擇合適的金融商品進行投資。對於理工科系人員，了解投資學課程是增強理工科系人員理財素養的重要課程之一。
description.en: Investment has its rewards and risks; different financial products have different rates of return and risk. For example: deposits have low rewards with low risks; futures have high rewards with high risks. With making a proper allocation of funds and choosing the right set of financial products, one can avoid unnecessary risks and get a good rate of return. Investment courses make students understand how to apply financial instruments theory to assess possible risks and returns in various financial instruments, and then invest the suitable financial products according to the economic capacity of investors. For science and engineering personnel, understanding the investment in science and engineering courses is one of the important programs to enhance financial literacy personnel.

description.zh: 藥膳在中醫理論指導下，將中草藥與實務相配合，運用傳統烹調技術和現代加工方法製成味、色、形俱佳的、更有保健和治療作用作之食品，其內容廣泛，迄今已有三千年之歷史。所謂藥食同源更是集中而深刻的體現了藥膳之重要性。本課程共分：湯膳概論、穀物湯膳、蔬菜湯膳、果品湯膳、畜肉湯膳、海鮮湯膳、藥草湯膳和美容養生湯膳等。
description.en: The Applied Nutrition of Life is two credit hours course and design especially for technology students. This curriculum emphasizes on the clinical applications and action mechanisms of various food cooking of Chinese drugs. The curriculum trends will start from more details and bring a completely concepts. The subjects include some Chinese food cooking contain Chinese herbal and some skill to how to select a good quality Chinese herbal.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本課程檢視受到廣泛使用的主要教育評鑑模式，並熟悉教育評鑑模式的取向與實用技術。
description.en: This course is designed to review the most widely used model for educational evaluation, to conversant with approach and utility technique of evaluation models.

description.zh: 先修課程：4402012 或負責教授同意介紹各種不同方法分析（如能量法及 Castigliano 定理），破壞理論，材料選用，可靠度概念，軸及軸承，離合器及煞車器，傳動元件（如皮帶、鏈條、齒輪），軸聯接器，飛輪，彈簧等。
description.en: Introduction to Analysis Methods (Energy method & Castigliano theorem), Failure Theory, Material Selection, Introduction to Reliability, Shafts and Bearings, Clutches and Brakes, Power Transmission Elements (Belts, Chains, Gears), Couplings, Flywheels, Springs.

description.zh: 本課程程主要為介紹深度學習和生成式人工智慧概念和基本原理。通過掌握這些原理，學生能了解可能極限，更能思考深度學習和和生成式人工智慧的應用。
description.en: This course mainly introduces the concepts and basic principles of deep learning and generative artificial intelligence. By mastering these principles, students can understand the limits of what is possible and be better able to think about the applications of deep learning and generative artificial intelligence.

name.zh: 深度學習和生成式人工智慧導論
name.en: Introduction to Deep Learn and Generative Artificial Intelligence

description.zh: 統計數據分析是一種利用數據對遇到問題進行適當推測的藝術 (有時是最好)，本課程是一門以微積分為基礎的統計學分析的入門課程，旨在幫助學生學習描述性和推論性的統計程序，以及在不同領域中使用有用的數據分析。在回顧描述性統計和一些必要的概率分佈後，我們將討論區間估計、點估計、假說檢定方差分析、線性回歸分析、因子設計、聚類分析的基本概念、分類和支持向量機，並伴隨著實踐和理論練習。因此這些技能將為學生提供一個基礎，培養學生獨自進行分析和有效評估他人統計分析結果的能力。
description.en: ‘Statistical data analytics’ is the art of using data to make appropriate (sometimes, best!) conjectures about problems encountered. This course is a calculus-based introduction to statistics and data analytics, and so designed to help students learn the introductory descriptive and inferential statistical procedures, and useful data analytics that are used in diverse areas. After a review of descriptive statistics and some necessary probability distributions, we will discuss interval and point estimation, hypothesis tests, ANOVA, linear regression analysis, factorial designs, and basic concept of cluster analysis, classification, and support vector machines accompanying practical and theoretical exercises. Consequently, these skills will provide the student with a basis to conduct their own such analyzes and to evaluate critically others’ uses of statistical analysis results.

description.zh: 公司治理已成為廿一世紀企業組織架構調整之重大議題，如何經由管理策略及法制設計使台灣企業經營回歸股東長期價值及利益，為政府、交易所與公會等自律機關、及企業經營者必須面對之問題。在法制上，獨立董事監察人、審計委員會之設置、公司自律守則之擬議、股東會之運作，均衝擊我國公司法、證券交易法及交易所規則現行管理架構及規範；在實務上，上市櫃公司如何順利接受公司治理之理念及管理規範，以提昇公司營運的外在評價與體質。
description.en: The corporate governance had been the enterprise framework adjustment of the main issue of the 21 century. How do the manage the corporate strategy and system of the law to make the profit for the shareholder, government and enterprise. The main purpose of the course to help the learner to understand the law of corporate and the practice of the enterprise.

notes: (群組 1) 經營與策略管理，2 週【停開】

description.zh: 論文寫作。
description.en: Thesis writing.

description.zh: 論文寫作。
description.en: Thesis writing.

description.zh: 論文寫作。
description.en: Thesis writing.

description.zh: 介紹各種產能反應的原子分子層級理論，包括燃燒、氫生成反應、氧還原反應、二氧化碳還原反應，和電化學電池、燃料電池，新能源材料等物理化學反應程序，以及低碳應用。
description.en: This course introduces reactions of energy production in the insight of atomic and molecular scale, including combustion, hydrogen evolution reaction, oxygen reduction reaction, carbon dioxide reduction reaction, and physiochemical mechanisms of electrochemical cells, fuel cells, new energy materials, and low-carbon applications.

description.zh: 電池分類，電池化學，電池功能及表現，電池之製造，電池使用注意事項，電池檢驗及測試，電池選擇及安裝，燃料電池，電動車使用之電池未來高級電池之介紹。
description.en: Battery Classification，Battery Chemistry，Battery Function and Performance，Battery Manufacturing，Battery service Precautions，Battery Inspection and Testing，Battery Selection and Installation，Fuel Battery， Battery for the Electric Vehicle，Introduction to the Advanced Future Battery.

description.zh: "人工智慧與多媒體應用" 這門課程主要探討如何將 AI 技術應用於商業創作和多媒體製作流程。我們將介紹 AI 深度學習模型，例如生成對抗網絡（GANs），探討人工智慧生成內容（AIGC）的議題，並著重於它們如何提升創作流程與工具操作的效率。我們將教授學生使用人工智慧模型和多媒體相關平台，並將這些技術應用於內容產出，如圖像生成、影片內容和音樂創作等。此外，我們也將探討如何將這些新技術與傳統多媒體製作流程結合，以及如何操作相關軟體，並將討論相關的企業道德、社會和法律議題。這門課程適合對人工智慧、多媒體應用，以及如何將這些技術應用於商業環境有興趣的學生。
description.en: The course "Artificial Intelligence and Multimedia Applications" focuses on applying AI technology in business and multimedia production. It covers AI deep learning models like Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) and discusses Artificial Intelligence Generated Content (AIGC) to improve creative processes. Students will learn to use AI models and multimedia platforms for content creation, including image generation, video production, and music composition. The course also examines integrating new technologies with traditional multimedia workflows, relevant software operation, and associated ethical, social, and legal issues. It is designed for students interested in AI and its applications in business.

name.zh: 人工智慧與多媒體應用

description.zh: 世界各區域經濟快速發展，面對高度競爭的趨勢，數位轉型是項關鍵議題。本課程的目的是教授學生數位轉型的基本概念與應用，並介紹成功案例使學生可以將案例經驗及所學應用於所屬公司或企業，以激發學生在數位轉型領域的創新應用。
description.en: The rapid economic development across various regions of the world, coupled with the trend of intense competition, makes digital transformation a key issue. The goal of this course is to teach students the fundamental concepts and applications of digital transformation, while also introducing successful case studies. This will enable students to apply the knowledge and experiences from these cases to their own companies or organizations, inspiring innovative applications in the field of digital transformation.

description.zh: 研究生透過個別化的學習方式就其興趣對技職教育課程的設計領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in curriculum and instruction. An individualized study program is planned for graduate students to develop the skills and research and guided by a professor.

name.zh: 獨立研究 -- 課程與教學

notes: 共同 303A, 開學第一週上課未出席者不得加選

description.zh: （一）瞭解人力資源發展之定義、內涵與功能；（二）培養進行人力資源發展之基本能力。課程內容包括：人力資源發展之定義與內涵、人力資源發展之需求評估、人力資源規劃、學習理論、訓練方法、教材編撰、訓練發展評量及國際化人力資源發展等。課程實施方法為講解、討論、參觀訪問及專題討論。
description.en: The course aims to (1) understand the definition, essence, and function of human resources development, (2) cultivate the fundamental capability of human resource development. It covers the definition and essence of human resources development, demand evaluation of human resource development, planning of human resource, learning theories, training method; curriculum designing and compilation, evaluation of training development, and international human resource development. The course is conducted through lectures, discussions, field trip activities, and colloquia.

description.zh: 本課程「資訊服務與顧客關係」旨在深入探討資訊科技如何改變企業與顧客之間的互動，以及顧客關係管理（CRM）的核心概念。課程強調數據驅動決策的重要性，幫助學生理解顧客行為並制定有效的商業策略。學生將學習設計以顧客為中心的服務體驗，並透過產業案例分析和數據洞察提升經營顧客關係的能力。此外，課程涵蓋數位行銷和社交媒體策略，探討資訊工具在顧客關係中的角色及其應用模式。學生還將實作各種 CRM 系統和自動化客服解決方案，如聊天機器人和商業智慧平台，以增強實務操作能力。本課程特別聚焦於當前產業趨勢及未來挑戰，包括資訊服務對顧客經營的影響。透過理論講授、案例研究、軟體操作及專題解說，學生將獲得理論知識與實務技能，為未來職場做好準備，培養能在快速變化的商業環境中有效管理顧客關係的人才。
description.en: This course explores how information technology transforms business-customer interactions and introduces the core concepts of Customer Relationship Management (CRM). It emphasizes data-driven decision-making to help students understand customer behavior and develop effective strategies. Students will learn to design customer-centric service experiences and enhance their relationship management skills through industry case analysis and tools for data insights.

description.zh: 本課程在於協助同學了解數位轉型的浪潮趨勢，以及適應新科技所改變的商業模式。課程將介紹創新的商業模式例如共享經濟、金融科技、線上至離線、使用者生成內容等平台模式應用。每個模式將會連結到實務中企業個案，以協助同學進一步深入了解與分析創新的模式概念。本課程將涵蓋數位轉型與創新模式的基本概念，以數位轉型與科技適應角度，透過實務案例來了解創新商業模式。
description.en: This course aims to help students understand the trend of digital transformation and technology adaption in business models. The innovative business models will be introduced such as sharing economy, FinTech, online-to-offline, user-generated content, and so on. The matched cases will be selected to elaborate and analyze the innovative business models. This course will provide comprehensive knowledge of innovative business models by digital transformation and technology adaption (information and communication technology).

name.zh: 數位轉型與創新商業模式
name.en: Digital Transformation and Innovative Business Models

description.zh: 本課程論述中古車之車況鑑定技術，包含車身結構鑑定、VIN 鑑定、泡水車鑑定及相關中古車車況技術鑑定。
description.en: This course discusses the vehicle condition appraisal technology of used cars, including car body structure appraisal, VIN appraisal, water-damaged car appraisal and related technical appraisal of used car condition.

name.en: Vehicle Condition Appraisal Technology of Used Cars

description.zh: 論文寫作。
description.en: Thesis writing.

description.zh: 本門課藉由濕空氣線圖討論空氣調節之過程，分析人體舒適與空氣品質之需求，及各種空調設備系統之設計。本門課在空調負荷計算原理與方法涵蓋輻射熱、熱傳導及熱儲存效應等之分析，系統設計包括送風與送水系統之計算與設計，及室內送風分佈之理論與設計。
description.en: Air-conditioning processes are discussed by using psychrometric charts. Thermal comfort and indoor air quality requirements are presented. Design of air-conditioning equipment and systems are introduced. Air-conditioning load analysis includes radiation, transfer, and heat storage effects. System design includes design and calculation air and water moving systems. Air distribution principles and design are also covered.

notes: 限學號雙數的學生選修

description.zh: 本課程在透過研討，讓學生瞭解科技管理觀念和趨勢。主要包括以下課題：（1）創新與研發管理（2）科技政策（3）技術預測（4）技術策略管理（5）技術開發與移轉（6）技術規劃與評估。
description.en: The course teaches the student Technology Management concepts and trend . The topics will be covered: (1) innovation and R&D management; (2) technology policy; (3) technology forecasting ; (4) technology strategy management ; (5) technology development and transfer; (6) technology planning and measurement.

description.zh: 研究生在第一年必須選定指導教授，以決定設計創作或論文寫作的方向，從事設計創作的研究生必須發展創作理念、創作過程與實作說明，最後彙整創作報告形同於研究論文；從事論文寫作的研究生針對互動媒體設計的相關主題進行研究，並將研究成果撰寫成為論文，其內容包含緒論、文獻探討、研究設計與實施、研究結果與討論、結論與建議等。本課程目的旨在培養獨立企劃研究能力，建構研究設計與研究寫作的能力，對設計創作組而言，過程中培養協同合作的能力是必須具備的要項。
description.en: In the first year graduate students are requested to determine design creation and research topic under the supervision of their advisor. Graduate students who are chosen the fields of design creation should be developed creation principle, design process and pr92tical work. The results of design creation are considered as research thesis. Graduate students who are focus on the research of inter92tive media design should be undertaken the results of research as a thesis. The content of thesis includes introduction, literature review, research design and appro92hes, results and discussion, conclusion and suggestions. The aims of this course are to provide students with opportunity to initiate personal research into industrial design related topic. The course includes a training of developing research, writing up and references. To design creation groups. The collaborative capability is in need of the cultivation of ability during the process.

description.zh: 碩士學位論文寫作
description.en: A student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

description.zh: 研究生在教授的指導下，針對工業設計相關特定研究主題進行研究，並將研究成果寫成論文。其內容包括研究方法、理論分析及研究結果﹙含結論與建議﹚。本課程主要目的在提供學生開啟個人對於工業設計領域相關議題的獨立研究能力。因此，本課程將包含如何建構研究設計、寫作與參考文獻的能力。
description.en: Graduate students are required to complete specific research topic under the restriction of their advisor. The results should be written as a thesis. The thesis focuses on the fields in "industrial design", and includes research methodology, theory background and conclusive result or findings. The aims of this course are to provide students with opportunity to initiate personal research into industrial design related topic. Therefore, the course includes a training of developing research, writing and bibliographic skills.

description.zh: 碩士學位論文寫作
description.en: A student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

description.zh: 戰略管理使用綜合管理視角去解決相關的制定和實施企業和企業級戰略的問題。該課程包括開發識別問題的能力，評估戰略選擇，並瞭解戰略的形成和執行的組織過程。它建立在功能區課程所獲得的知識，並使用案例研究和項目，以提高學生的分析和決策能力。前提：必須參與上學期的課程或與得到研究生導師的許可。
description.en: Strategic management uses a general management perspective in addressing issues related to the formulation and implementation of corporate and business level strategy. The course involves developing the ability to identify issues, evaluate strategic options and understand the organizational process by which strategies get formed and executed. It builds on the knowledge gained in functional area courses and uses case studies and projects to improve students' analytical and decision-making skills. Prerequisite: Must be taken in last semester or with permission of the Graduate Advisor.

notes: UTA, 碩二修，Dr. Liliana,12/1 輔課，12/13-16 正課

description.zh: 研究生須要具有整合、分析資料與創新思維、寫作能力以完成碩博士論文。本課程主要包括：一、 良好研究特質，二、 研究規劃， 三、學習方法， 四、 創新思維方法 五、 寫作方法， 六、 簡報方法， 七、 研究實務練習
description.en: Graduate students need to integrate information and innovative insights to successfully achieve a master or Ph.D degree. The course includes: 1. Characteristics of good researchers. 2. Research planning. 3. Learning method. 4. Innovative thinking. 5. Writing method. 6. Present method. 7. Research design practice

description.zh: 該課程強調關鍵的經濟和商業概念（包括對需求和供應，生產，成本和利潤的分析；市場支配力；戰略行為和定價；國際貿易理論）影響決策。
description.en: The course emphasizes key economic and business concepts(including analysis of demand and supply, production, cost, and profit; market power, strategic behavior, and pricing; international trade theories) that influence decisions.

notes: UTA, 碩一修，Dr.Mahmut Yasar,3/1 輔課；3/7-10 正課

description.zh: 本課程在介紹如何運用企業內與員工之有關資源，包括其能力、知識、技術、態度和激勵，以配合企業整體競爭策略與形式。其內容有：人力資源分析、策略及目標、支援性作業之取得、發展及報酬、人力資源的維護。
description.en: This course introduce how to apply the resource of the inter-corporation and employee, such as capacity, knowledge, technology, attitude and incentive, in order to cooperate business integrate competitive strategy.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生須於學期中至相關機構連續實習 18 週，每週不得低於 2.5 天。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核，學生應於校外實習完成後一週內繳交校外實習報告，由實習輔導老師評定實習成績。
description.en: This course is designed to enhance students' on-job practical experiences. Students will work at an engineering related company or research organizations for 18 weeks (20 hours per week) during the semester. Through the program, students would learn the hands-on professional technology. Each student would be required to submit a written report right after the end of the internship for grading.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用整學期至電子工程相關機構實習，參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告。須在同一機構連續實習 4.5 月，學生應全職於實習機構實習。
description.en: The course is developed to increase on-job practice capability of students. Participants practice and learn the real operation of the electronic engineering related fields in one of the corporative electronic engineering company during one semester. A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement. It is necessary to practice in one corporative electronic engineering company full-time at least 4.5 months.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用課餘至相關機構實習（實習實際天數依「校外實習」實行辦法另訂之），參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業企業之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，彙交系上保存。
description.en: The course is developed to increase students' capability of on-job practice. Participation in one of the corporative company during summer vocation, practice and learn the real operation of the ing related fields . A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用學期間至相關機構實習（實習實際天數依「校外實習」實行辦法另訂之），參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業企業之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，彙交系上保存。

Participation in one of the corporative company during semester period, practice and learn the real operation of the ing related fields . A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用學期間至相關機構實習（實習實際天數依「校外實習」實行辦法另訂之），參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業企業之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，彙交系上保存。

Participation in one of the corporative company during curriculum session, practice and learn the real operation of the ing related fields . A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生至機械相關機構實習（實習實際天數依「校外實習」實行辦法另訂之），參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，彙交系上保存。
description.en: The course is developed to increase students' capability of on-job practice. Participation in one of the corporative mechanical engineering company, practice and learn the real operation of the mechanical engineering related fields. A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement.
